GK19asvsau2u:59: muniḥ sa viyadutpatya tānuvāca nṛpātmajān // Saund_1.28 //

GK19asvsau2u:124: yo jyāyānatha vayasā guṇaiśca teṣāṃ bhātṝṇāṃ vṛṣabha ivaujasā vṛṣāṇām /
GK19asvsau2u:125: te tatra priyaguravastamabhyaṣicannādityā daśaśatalocanaṃ divīva // Saund_1.61 //

GK19asvsau2u:136: vikrānto nayavāṃścaiva dhīraḥ sumukha eva ca // Saund_2.3 //
GK19asvsau2u:137: vapuṣmāṃśca na ca stabdho dakṣiṇo na ca nārjavaḥ /

GK19asvsau2u:140: abhavad yo na vimukhastejasā ditsayaiva ca // Saund_2.5 //
GK19asvsau2u:142: rājyaṃ dīkṣāmiva vahan vṛttenānvagamat pitṝn // Saund_2.6 //
GK19asvsau2u:145: kṛtaśāstraḥ kṛtāstro vā jāto vā vipule kule /

GK19asvsau2u:147: hitaṃ vipriyamapyukto yaḥ suśrāva na cukṣubhe /

GK19asvsau2u:153: adhyaiṣṭa yaḥ paraṃ brahma na vyaiṣṭa satataṃ dhṛteḥ /

GK19asvsau2u:158: vyarociṣṭa ca śiṣṭebhyo māsīṣe candramā iva // Saund_2.14 //
GK19asvsau2u:162: acaiṣīcca nayairbhūmiṃ bhūyasā yaśasaiva ca // Saund_2.16 //
GK19asvsau2u:172: āryabhāvācca nādhukṣad dviṣato 'pi sato guṇān // Saund_2.21 //
GK19asvsau2u:173: ākṛkṣad vapuṣā dṛṣṭīḥ prajānāṃ candramā iva /
GK19asvsau2u:175: nākrukṣad viṣaye tasya kaścitkaiścit kvacit kṣataḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:180: sthitaḥ kārtayuge dharme dharmāt kṛcchre 'pi nāsrasat // Saund_2.25 //
GK19asvsau2u:182: avartiṣṭa ca vṛddheṣu nāvṛtad garhite pathi // Saund_2.26 //
GK19asvsau2u:206: priya ityeva cāśaktaṃ na saṃrāgādavīvṛdhat // Saund_2.38 //
GK19asvsau2u:207: tejasā ca tviṣā caiva ripūn dṛptānabībhasat /

GK19asvsau2u:210: dravyaṃ mahadapi tyaktvā na caivākīrti kiñcana // Saund_2.40 //
GK19asvsau2u:212: jitvā dṛptānapi ripūnna tenākāri vismayaḥ // Saund_2.41 //
GK19asvsau2u:215: na tenādarśi viṣamaṃ kāryaṃ kvacana kiṃcana /
GK19asvsau2u:216: vipriyapriyayoḥ kṛtye na tenāgāmi nikriyāḥ // Saund_2.43 //
GK19asvsau2u:217: tenāpāyi yathākalpaṃ somaśca yaśa eva ca /

GK19asvsau2u:220: aśakyaḥ śakyasāmantaḥ śākyarājaḥ sa śakravat // Saund_2.45 //
GK19asvsau2u:221: atha tasmin tathā kāle dharmakāmā divaukasaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:226: upapattiṃ praṇidadhe kule tasya mahīpateḥ // Saund_2.48 //
GK19asvsau2u:227: tasyā devī nṛdevasya māyā nāma tadābhavat /

GK19asvsau2u:242: babhrāje śāntayā lakṣmyā dharmo vigrahavāniva // Saund_2.56 //
GK19asvsau2u:244: nando nāma suto jajñe nityānandakaraḥ kule // Saund_2.57 //
GK19asvsau2u:246: vapuṣāgryeṇa yo nāma sundaropapadaṃ dadhe // Saund_2.58 //
GK19asvsau2u:248: aṅgavāniva cānaṅgaḥ sa babhau kāntayā śriyā // Saund_2.59 //
GK19asvsau2u:249: sa tau saṃvardhayāmāsa narendraḥ parayā mudā /
GK19asvsau2u:251: tasya kālena satputrau vavṛdhāte bhavāya tau /
GK19asvsau2u:256: kāmeṣvajasraṃ pramamāda nandaḥ sarvārthasiddhastu na saṃrarañja // Saund_2.63 //
GK19asvsau2u:257: sa prekṣyaiva hi jīrṇamāturaṃ ca mṛtaṃ ca vimṛśan jagadanabhijñamārtacittaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:259: udvegādapunarbhave manaḥ praṇidhāya sa yayau śayitavarāṅganādanāsthaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:260: niśi nṛpatinilayanād vanagamanakṛtamanāḥ sarasa iva mathitanalināt kalahaṃsaḥ // Saund_2.65 //

GK19asvsau2u:270: sa vicārayan jagati kiṃ nu paramamiti taṃ tamāgamam /

GK19asvsau2u:272: atha naiṣa mārga iti vīkṣya tadapi vipulaṃ jahau tapaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:279: harṣatulamagaman muditā vimukhī tu mārapariṣat pracukṣubhe // Saund_3.8 //
GK19asvsau2u:280: sanagā ca bhūḥ pravicacāla hutabahasakhaḥ śivo vavau /

GK19asvsau2u:287: śāntiriyamayamupāya iti pravibhāgaśaḥ paramidaṃ catuṣṭayam // Saund_3.12 //
GK19asvsau2u:291: krodhamadabhayataraṅgacalaṃ pratatāra lokamapi ca vyatārayat // Saund_3.14 //
GK19asvsau2u:292: sa vinīya kāśiṣu gayeṣu bahujanamatho girivraje /

GK19asvsau2u:295: sūryasadṛśavapurabhyudito vijahāra sūrya iva gautamastamaḥ // Saund_3.16 //
GK19asvsau2u:297: vastumatiśuci śivopavanaṃ sa dadarśa niḥspṛhatayā yathā vanam // Saund_3.17 //
GK19asvsau2u:300: pratipūjayā na sa jaharṣa na ca śucamavajñayāgamat /

GK19asvsau2u:306: sa vicakrame divi bhuvīva punarupaviveśa tasthivān /
GK19asvsau2u:308: salile kṣitāviva cacāra jalamiva viveśa medinīm /
GK19asvsau2u:309: megha iva divi vavarṣa punaḥ punarajvalannava ivodito raviḥ // Saund_3.23 //
GK19asvsau2u:311: taptakanakasadṛśaprabhayā sa babhau pradīpta iva sandhyayā ghanaḥ // Saund_3.24 //

GK19asvsau2u:317: dharmamatulamadhigamya munermuṃnaye nanāma sa yato gurāviva // Saund_3.27 //
GK19asvsau2u:319: śākyatanayavṛṣabhāḥ kṛtino vṛṣabhā ivānalabhayāt pravavrajuḥ // Saund_3.28 //

GK19asvsau2u:337: bhraṃśini śithilaguṇo 'pi yuge vijahāra tatra munisaṃśrayājjanaḥ // Saund_3.37 //
GK19asvsau2u:339: sarvamaśivamavagamya bhavaṃ bhavasaṃkṣayāya vavṛte na janmane // Saund_3.38 //

GK19asvsau2u:346: iti muditamanāmayaṃ nirāpat kururaghupūrupuropamaṃ puraṃ tat /
GK19asvsau2u:347: abhavadabhayadaiśike maharṣau viharati tatra śivāya vītarāge // Saund_3.42 //

GK19asvsau2u:351: munau bruvāṇe 'pi tu tatra dharmaṃ dharmaṃ prati jñātiṣu cādṛteṣu /
GK19asvsau2u:352: prāsādasaṃstho madanaikakāryaḥ priyāsahāyo vijahāra nandaḥ // Saund_4.1 //
GK19asvsau2u:353: sa cakravākyeva hi cakravākastayā sametaḥ priyayā priyārhaḥ /

GK19asvsau2u:355: lakṣmyā ca rūpeṇa ca sundarīti stambhena garveṇa ca māninīti /
GK19asvsau2u:356: dīptyā ca mānena ca bhāminīti yāto babhāṣe trividhena nāmnā // Saund_4.3 //
GK19asvsau2u:358: bhūyo babhāse svakuloditena strīpadminī nandadivākareṇa // Saund_4.4 //
GK19asvsau2u:360: manuṣyaloke hi tadā babhūva sā sundarī strīṣu nareṣu nandaḥ // Saund_4.5 //
GK19asvsau2u:361: sā devatā nandanacāriṇīva kulasya nandījananaśca nandaḥ /

GK19asvsau2u:363: tāṃ sundarī cenna labheta nandaḥ sā vā niṣeveta na taṃ natabhrūḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:364: dvandvaṃ dhruvaṃ tadvikalaṃ na śobhetānyonyahīnāviva rātricandrau // Saund_4.7 //
GK19asvsau2u:366: praharṣatuṣṭyoriva pātrabhūtaṃ dvandvaṃ sahāraṃsta madāndhabhūtam // Saund_4.8 //
GK19asvsau2u:373: vibhūṣayāmāsa tataḥ priyāṃ sa siṣeviṣustāṃ na mṛjāvahārtham /
GK19asvsau2u:374: svenaiva rūpeṇa vibhūṣitā hi vibhūṣaṇānāmapi bhūṣaṇaṃ sā // Saund_4.12 //
GK19asvsau2u:375: dattvātha sā darpaṇamasya haste mamāgrato dhāraya tāvadenam /
GK19asvsau2u:376: viśeṣakaṃ yāvadahaṃ karomītyuvāca kāntaṃ sa ca taṃ babhāra // Saund_4.13 //
GK19asvsau2u:377: bhartustataḥ śmaśru nirīkṣamāṇā viśeṣakaṃ sāpi cakāra tādṛk /
GK19asvsau2u:378: niśvāsavātena ca darpaṇasya cikitsayitvā nijaghāna nandaḥ // Saund_4.14 //
GK19asvsau2u:379: sā tena ceṣṭālalitena bhartuḥ śāṭhyena cāntarmanasā jahāsa /
GK19asvsau2u:380: bhavecca ruṣṭā kila nāma tasmai lalāṭajihmāṃ bhṛkuṭiṃ cakāra // Saund_4.15 //
GK19asvsau2u:381: cikṣepa karṇotpalamasya cāṃse kareṇa savyena madālasena /
GK19asvsau2u:382: patrāṅguliṃ cārdhanimīlitākṣe vaktre 'sya tāmeva vinirdudhāva // Saund_4.16 //
GK19asvsau2u:384: padbhyāṃ priyāyā nalinopabhābhyāṃ mūrdhnā bhayānnāma nanāma nandaḥ // Saund_4.17 //
GK19asvsau2u:385: sa muktapuṣponmiṣitena mūrdhnā tataḥ priyāyāḥ priyakṛd babhāse /
GK19asvsau2u:388: kathaṃ kṛto 'sīti jahāsa coccairmukhena sācīkṛtakuṇḍalena // Saund_4.19 //
GK19asvsau2u:390: tamālapatrārdratale kapole samāpayāmāsa viśeṣakaṃ tat // Saund_4.20 //
GK19asvsau2u:391: tasyā mukhaṃ tat satamālapatraṃ tāmrādharauṣṭhaṃ cikurāyatākṣam /
GK19asvsau2u:394: viśeṣakāvekṣaṇakekarākṣo laḍat priyāyā vadanaṃ dadarśa // Saund_4.22 //
GK19asvsau2u:396: nandaḥ priyāyā mukhamīkṣamāṇo bhūyaḥ priyānandakaro babhūva // Saund_4.23 //
GK19asvsau2u:397: vimānakalpe sa vimānagarbhe tatastathā caiva nananda nandaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:398: tathāgataścāgatabhaikṣakālo bhaikṣāya tasya praviveśa veśma // Saund_4.24 //
GK19asvsau2u:399: avāṅamukho niṣpraṇāyaśca tasthau bhrāturgṛhe 'nyasya gṛhe yathaiva /
GK19asvsau2u:402: ayojayat snānavidhiṃ tathānyā jagranthuranyāḥ surabhīḥ srajaśca // Saund_4.26 //
GK19asvsau2u:403: tasmin gṛhe bharturataścarantyaḥ krīḍānurūpaṃ lalitaṃ niyogam /
GK19asvsau2u:404: kāścinna buddhaṃ dadṛśuryuvatyo buddhasya vaiṣā niyataṃ manīṣā // Saund_4.27 //
GK19asvsau2u:405: kācit sthitā tatra tu harmyapṛṣṭhe gavākṣapakṣe praṇidhāya cakṣuḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:406: viniṣpatantaṃ sugataṃ dadarśa payodagarbhādiva dīptamarkam // Saund_4.28 //
GK19asvsau2u:407: sā gauravaṃ tatra vicārya bhartuḥ svayā ca bhaktyārhatayārhataśca /
GK19asvsau2u:408: nandasya tasthau purato vivakṣustadājñayā ceti tadācacakṣe // Saund_4.29 //
GK19asvsau2u:409: anugrahāyāsya janasya śaṅke gururgṛhaṃ no bhagavān praviṣṭaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:410: bhikṣāmalabdhvā giramāsanaṃ vā śūnyādaraṇyādiva yāti bhūyaḥ // Saund_4.30 //
GK19asvsau2u:411: śrutvā maharṣeḥ sa gṛhapraveśaṃ satkārahīnaṃ ca punaḥ prayāṇam /
GK19asvsau2u:413: kṛtvāñjaliṃ mūrdhani padmakalpaṃ tataḥ sa kāntāṃ gamanaṃ yayāce /
GK19asvsau2u:414: karttu gamiṣyāmi gurau praṇāmaṃ māmabhyanujñātumihārhasīti // Saund_4.32 //
GK19asvsau2u:415: sā vepamānā parisasvaje taṃ śālaṃ latā vātasamīriteva /
GK19asvsau2u:416: dadarśa cāśruplutalolanetrā dīrghe ca niśvasya vaco 'bhyuvāca // Saund_4.33 //
GK19asvsau2u:418: gacchāryaputraihi ca śīghrameva viśeṣako yāvadayaṃ na śuṣkaḥ // Saund_4.34 //
GK19asvsau2u:419: sacedbhavestvaṃ khalu dīrghasūtro daṇḍaṃ mahāntaṃ tvayi pātayeyam /
GK19asvsau2u:420: muhurmuhustvāṃ śayitaṃ kucābhyāṃ vibodhayeyaṃ ca na cālapeyam // Saund_4.35 //
GK19asvsau2u:424: evaṃ kariṣyāmi vimuñca caṇḍi yāvad gururdūragato na me saḥ // Saund_4.37 //
GK19asvsau2u:425: tataḥ stanodvartitatacandanābhyāṃ mukto bhujābhyāṃ na tu mānasena /
GK19asvsau2u:426: vihāya veṣaṃ madanānurūpaṃ satkārayogyaṃ sa vapurbabhāra // Saund_4.38 //
GK19asvsau2u:427: sā taṃ prayāntaṃ ramaṇaṃ pradadhyau pradhyānaśūnyasthitaniścalākṣī /
GK19asvsau2u:428: sthitoccakarṇā vyapaviddhaśaṣpā bhrāntaṃ mṛgam bhrāntamukhī mṛgīva // Saund_4.39 //
GK19asvsau2u:429: didṛkṣayākṣiptamanā munestu nandaḥ prayāṇaṃ prati tatvare ca /
GK19asvsau2u:430: vivṛttadṛṣṭiśca śanairyayau tāṃ karīva paśyan sa laḍatkareṇum // Saund_4.40 //
GK19asvsau2u:432: kākṣeṇa paśyan na tatarpa nandaḥ pibannivaikena jalaṃ kareṇa // Saund_4.41 //
GK19asvsau2u:433: taṃ gauravaṃ buddhagataṃ cakarṣa bhāryānurāgaḥ punarācakarṣa /
GK19asvsau2u:434: so 'niścayānnāpi yayau na tasthau turaṃstaraṃgeṣviva rājahaṃsaḥ // Saund_4.42 //
GK19asvsau2u:436: śrutvā tato nūpuranisvanaṃ sa punarlalambe hṛdaye gṛhītaḥ // Saund_4.43 //
GK19asvsau2u:437: sa kāmarāgeṇa nigṛhyamāṇo dharmānurāgeṇa ca kṛṣyamāṇaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:438: jagāma duḥkhena vivartyamānaḥ plavaḥ pratistrota ivāpagāyāḥ // Saund_4.44 //
GK19asvsau2u:439: tataḥ kramairdīrghatamaiḥ pracakrame kathaṃ nu yāto na gururbhavediti /
GK19asvsau2u:440: svajeya tāṃ caiva viśeṣakapriyāṃ kathaṃ priyāmārdraviśeṣakāmiti // Saund_4.45 //
GK19asvsau2u:441: atha sa pathi dadarśa muktamānaṃ pitṛnagare 'pi tathā gatābhimānam /
GK19asvsau2u:443: saundarananda mahākāvye “bhāryāyācitaka” nāma caturtha sarga samāpta /
GK19asvsau2u:447: mahāpaṇebhyo vyavahāriṇaśca mahāmunau bhaktivaśāt praṇemuḥ // Saund_5.1 //
GK19asvsau2u:449: kecit svakeṣvāvasatheṣu tasthuḥ kṛtvāñjalīn vīkṣaṇatatparākṣāḥ // Saund_5.2 //
GK19asvsau2u:451: jagāma duḥkhena vigāhamāno jalāgame strota ivāpagāyāḥ // Saund_5.3 //
GK19asvsau2u:452: atho mahadbhiḥ pati saṃpatadbhiḥ saṃpūjyamānāya tathāgatāya /
GK19asvsau2u:453: karttuṃ praṇāmaṃ na śaśāka nandastenābhireme tu gurormahimnā // Saund_5.4 //
GK19asvsau2u:454: svaṃ cāvasaṅgaṃ pathi nirmumukṣurbhaktiṃ janasyānyamateśva rakṣan /
GK19asvsau2u:455: nandaṃ ca gehābhimukhaṃ jighṛkṣan mārgaṃ tato 'nyaṃ sugataḥ prapede // Saund_5.5 //
GK19asvsau2u:456: tato viviktaṃ ca viviktacetāḥ sanmārgavin mārgamabhipratasthe /
GK19asvsau2u:457: gatvāgrataścāgryatamāya tasmai nāndīvimuktāya nanāma nandaḥ // Saund_5.6 //
GK19asvsau2u:462: tatsādhu sāhupriya mattpriyārtham tatrāstu bhikṣūttama bhaikṣakālaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:463: asau hi madhyaṃ nabhaso yiyāsuḥ kālaṃ pratismārayatīva sūryaḥ // Saund_5.9 //
GK19asvsau2u:465: tādṛṅ nimittaṃ sugataścakāra nāhārakṛtyaṃ sa yathā viveda // Saund_5.10 //
GK19asvsau2u:466: tataḥ sa kṛtvā munaye praṇāmaṃ gṛhaprayāṇāya matiṃ cakāra /
GK19asvsau2u:467: anugrahārthaṃ sugatastu tasmai pātraṃ dadau puraṣkarapatranetraḥ // Saund_5.11 //
GK19asvsau2u:468: tataḥ sa loke dadataḥ phalārthaṃ pātrasya tasyāpratimasya pātram /
GK19asvsau2u:469: jagrāha cāpagrahaṇakṣamābhyāṃ padmopamābhyāṃ prayataḥ karābhyām // Saund_5.12 //
GK19asvsau2u:471: hastasthapātro 'pi gṛhaṃ yiyāsuḥ sasāra mārgānmunimīkṣamāṇaḥ // Saund_5.13 //
GK19asvsau2u:472: bhāryānurāgeṇa yadā gṛhaṃ sa pātraṃ gṛhītvāpi yiyāsureva /
GK19asvsau2u:474: nirmokṣabījaṃ hi dadarśa tasya jñānaṃ mṛdu kleśarajaśca tīvram /
GK19asvsau2u:475: kleśānukūlaṃ viṣayātmakaṃ ca nandaṃ yatastaṃ munirācakarṣa // Saund_5.15 //
GK19asvsau2u:480: nandaḥ sa ca pratyayaneyacetā yaṃ śiśriye tanmayatāmavāpa /
GK19asvsau2u:481: yasmādimaṃ tatra cakāra yannaṃ taṃ snehapaṅkān munirujjihīrṣan // Saund_5.18 //
GK19asvsau2u:487: kareṇa cakrāṅkatalena mūrdhni pasparśa caivedamuvāca cainam // Saund_5.21 //
GK19asvsau2u:488: yāvanna hiṃsraḥ samupaiti kālaḥ śamāya tāvat kuru saumya buddhim /
GK19asvsau2u:489: sarvāsvavasthāsviha vartamānaṃ sarvābhisāreṇa nihanti mṛtyuḥ // Saund_5.22 //
GK19asvsau2u:491: havyairivāgneḥ pavaneritasya lokasya kāmairna hi tṛptirasti // Saund_5.23 //
GK19asvsau2u:494: hitasya vaktā pravaraḥ suhṛdbhyo dharmāya khedo guṇavān śramebhyaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:495: jñānāya kṛtyaṃ paramaṃ kriyābhyaḥ kimindriyāṇāmupagamya dāsyam // Saund_5.25 //
GK19asvsau2u:497: nityaṃ śivaṃ śāntisukhaṃ vṛṇīṣva kimindriyārthārthamanarthamūḍhvā // Saund_5.26 //
GK19asvsau2u:498: jarāsamā nāstyamṛjā prajānāṃ vyādheḥ samo nāsti jagatyanarthaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:499: mṛtyoḥ samaṃ nāsti bhayaṃ pṛthivyāmetattrayaṃ khalvavaśena sevyam // Saund_5.27 //
GK19asvsau2u:500: snehena kaścinna samo 'sti pāśaḥ sroto na tṛṣṇāsamamasti hāri /
GK19asvsau2u:501: rāgāgninā nāsti samastathāgnistaccet trayaṃ nāsti sukhaṃ ca te 'sti // Saund_5.28 //
GK19asvsau2u:504: prajñāmayaṃ varma badhāna tasmānno kṣāntinighnasya hi śokabāṇāḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:506: yathauṣadhairhastagataiḥ savidyo na daśyate kaścana pannagena /
GK19asvsau2u:507: tathānapekṣo jitalokamoho na daśyate śokabhujaṃgamena // Saund_5.31 //
GK19asvsau2u:508: āsthāya yogaṃ parigamya tattvaṃ na trāsamāgacchati mṛtyukāle /
GK19asvsau2u:509: ābaddhavarmā sudhanuḥ kṛtāsro jigīṣayā śūra ivāhavasthaḥ // Saund_5.32 //
GK19asvsau2u:511: dhṛṣṭaṃ girāntarhṛdayena sīdaṃstatheti nandaḥ sugataṃ babhāṣe // Saund_5.33 //
GK19asvsau2u:512: atha pramādācca tamujjihīrṣan matvāgamasyaiva ca pātrabhūtam /
GK19asvsau2u:515: śanaistatastaṃ samupetya nando na pravrajiṣyāmyahamityuvāca // Saund_5.35 //
GK19asvsau2u:516: śrutvātha nandasya manīṣitaṃ tad buddhāya vaidehamuniḥ śaśaṃsa /
GK19asvsau2u:517: saṃśrutya tasmādapi tasya bhāvaṃ mahāmunirnandamuvāca bhūyaḥ // Saund_5.36 //
GK19asvsau2u:519: jñātīṃśca dṛṣṭvā vratino gṛhasthān saṃvinna kiṃ te 'sti na vāsti cetaḥ // Saund_5.37 //
GK19asvsau2u:520: rājarṣayaste viditā na nūnaṃ vanāni ye śiśriyire hasantaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:521: niṣṭhīvya kāmānupaśāntikāmāḥ kāmeṣu naivaṃ kṛpaṇeṣu saktāḥ // Saund_5.38 //
GK19asvsau2u:522: bhūyaḥ samālokya gṛheṣu doṣān niśāmya tattyāgakṛtaṃ ca śarma /
GK19asvsau2u:523: naivāsti moktuṃ matirālayaṃ te deśaṃ mumūrṣoriva sopasargam // Saund_5.39 //
GK19asvsau2u:524: saṃsārakāntāraparāyaṇasya śive kathaṃ te pathi nārurukṣā /
GK19asvsau2u:525: āropyamāṇasya tameva mārgaṃ bhraṣṭasya sārthādiva sārthikasya // Saund_5.40 //
GK19asvsau2u:526: yaḥ sarvato veśmani dahyamāne śayīta mohānna tato vyapeyāt /
GK19asvsau2u:527: kālāgninā vyādhijarāśikhena loke pradīpte sa bhavet pramattaḥ // Saund_5.41 //
GK19asvsau2u:528: praṇīyamānaśca yathā vadhāya matto hasecca pralapecca vadhyaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:529: mṛtyau tathā tiṣṭhati pāśahaste śocyaḥ pramādyan viparitacetāḥ // Saund_5.42 //
GK19asvsau2u:530: yadā narendrāśca kuṭumbinaśca vihāya bandhūṃśca parigrahāṃśca /
GK19asvsau2u:531: yayuśca yāsyanti ca yānti caiva priyeṣvanityeṣu kuto 'nurodhaḥ // Saund_5.43 //
GK19asvsau2u:532: kiñcinna paśyāmi ratasya yatra tadanyabhāvena bhavenna duḥkham /
GK19asvsau2u:533: tasmāt kvacinna kṣamate prasaktiryadi kṣamastadvigamānna śokaḥ // Saund_5.44 //
GK19asvsau2u:534: tatsaumya lolaṃ parigamya lokaṃ māyopamaṃ citramivendrajālam /
GK19asvsau2u:535: priyābhidhānaṃ tyaja mohajālaṃ chettuṃ matiste yadi duḥkhajālam // Saund_5.45 //
GK19asvsau2u:536: varaṃ hitodarkamāniṣṭamannaṃ na svādu yat syādahitānubaddham /
GK19asvsau2u:537: yasmādahaṃ tvāṃ viniyojayāmi śive śucau vartmani vipriye 'pi // Saund_5.46 //
GK19asvsau2u:539: tathojjihīrṣuḥ khalu rāgaśalyaṃ tattvāmavocaṃ paruṣaṃ hitāya // Saund_5.47 //
GK19asvsau2u:543: yāvadvayo yogavidhau samarthaṃ buddhiṃ kuru śreyasi tāvadeva // Saund_5.49 //
GK19asvsau2u:544: ityevamuktaḥ sa vināyakena hitaiṣiṇā kāruṇikena nandaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:545: kartāsmi sarvaṃ bhagavan vacaste tathā yathājñāpayasītyuvāca // Saund_5.50 //
GK19asvsau2u:548: atho nataṃ tasya mukhaṃ sabāṣpaṃ pravāsyamāneṣu śiroruheṣu /
GK19asvsau2u:551: pūrṇaḥ śaśī bahulapakṣagataḥ kṣapānte bālātapena pariṣikta ivāvabhāse // Saund_5.53 //
GK19asvsau2u:552: saundarananda kāvye “nandadīkṣā” nāma pañcama sarga samāpta /
GK19asvsau2u:555: tato hṛte bharttari gauraveṇa prītau hṛtāyāmaratau kṛtāyām /
GK19asvsau2u:556: tatraiva harmyopari vartamānā na sundarī saiva tadā babhāse // Saund_6.1 //
GK19asvsau2u:559: vilambahārā calayoktrakā sā tasmād vimānād vinatā cakāśe /
GK19asvsau2u:560: tapaḥ kṣayādapsarasāṃ vareva cyutaṃ vimānāt priyamīkṣamāṇā // Saund_6.3 //
GK19asvsau2u:562: cintācalākṣeṇa mukhena tasthau bharttāramanyatra viśaṅkamānā // Saund_6.4 //
GK19asvsau2u:565: athātra kācit pramadā sabāṣpāṃ tāṃ duḥkhitāṃ draṣṭumanīpsamānā /
GK19asvsau2u:566: prāsādasopānatalapraṇādaṃ cakāra padbhyāṃ sahasā rudantī // Saund_6.6 //
GK19asvsau2u:568: prītyāṃ prasaktaiva ca saṃjaharṣa priyopayānaṃ pariśaṅkamānā // Saund_6.7 //
GK19asvsau2u:570: sopānakukṣiṃ prasasāra harṣād bhraṣṭaṃ dukūlāntamacintayantī // Saund_6.8 //
GK19asvsau2u:571: tāmaṅganāṃ prekṣya ca vipralabdhā niśvasya bhūyaḥ śayanaṃ prapede /
GK19asvsau2u:572: vivarṇavaktrā na rarāja cāśu vivarṇacandreva himāgame dyauḥ // Saund_6.9 //
GK19asvsau2u:573: sā duḥkhitā bhartturadarśanena kāmena kopena ca dahyamānā /
GK19asvsau2u:574: kṛtvā kare vaktramupopaviṣṭā cintānadīṃ śokajalāṃ tatāra // Saund_6.10 //
GK19asvsau2u:575: tasyāḥ mukhaṃ padmasapatnabhūtaṃ pāṇau sthitaṃ pallavarāgatāmre /
GK19asvsau2u:576: chāyāmayasyāmbhasi paṅkajasya babhau nataṃ padmamivopariṣṭāt // Saund_6.11 //
GK19asvsau2u:577: sā strīsvabhāvena vicintya tattad dṛṣṭānurāge 'bhimukhe 'pi patyau /
GK19asvsau2u:578: dharmāśrite tattvamavindamānā saṃkalpya tattadvilalāpa tattat // Saund_6.12 //
GK19asvsau2u:579: eṣyāmyanāśyānaviśeṣakāyāṃ tvayīti kṛtvā mayi taṃ pratijñām /
GK19asvsau2u:580: kasmānnu hetordayitapratijñaḥ so 'dya priyo me vitathapratijñaḥ // Saund_6.13 //
GK19asvsau2u:583: ratipriyasya priyavartino me priyasya nūnaṃ hṛdaya viraktam /
GK19asvsau2u:584: tathāpi rāgo yadi tasya hi syān maccittarakṣī na sa nāgataḥ syāt // Saund_6.15 //
GK19asvsau2u:585: rūpeṇa bhāvena ca madviśiṣṭā priyeṇa dṛṣṭā niyataṃ tato 'nyā /
GK19asvsau2u:586: tathā hi kṛtvā mayi moghasāntvaṃ lagnāṃ satiṃ māmāgamad vihāya // Saund_6.16 //
GK19asvsau2u:587: bhaktiṃ sa buddhaṃ prati yāvavocattasya prayātuṃ mayi so 'padeśaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:588: munau prasādo yadi tasya hi syānmṛtyorivogrādanṛtād bibhīyāt // Saund_6.17 //
GK19asvsau2u:590: bibharti so 'nyasya janasya taṃ cennamo 'stu tasmai calasauhṛdāya // Saund_6.18 //
GK19asvsau2u:591: necchanti yāḥ śokamavāptumevaṃ śraddhātumarhanti na tā narāṇām /
GK19asvsau2u:592: kva cānuvṛttirmayi sāsya pūrvaṃ tyāgaḥ kva cāyaṃ janavat kṣaṇena // Saund_6.19 //
GK19asvsau2u:593: ityevamādi priyaviprayuktā priye 'nyadāśaṅkya ca sā jagāda /
GK19asvsau2u:594: saṃbhrāntamāruhya ca tadvimānaṃ tāṃ strī sabāṣpā giramityuvāca // Saund_6.20 //
GK19asvsau2u:596: yastvāṃ priyo nābhyacarat kadācittamanyathā yāsyatikātarāsi // Saund_6.21 //
GK19asvsau2u:597: mā svāminaṃ svāmini doṣato gāḥ priyaṃ priyārhaṃ priyakāriṇaṃ tam /
GK19asvsau2u:598: na sa tvadanyāṃ pramadāmavaiti svacakravākyā iva cakravākaḥ // Saund_6.22 //
GK19asvsau2u:600: bhrātrā kilāryeṇa tathāgatena pravrājito netrajalārdravaktraḥ // Saund_6.23 //
GK19asvsau2u:601: śrutvā tato bhartari tāṃ pravṛttiṃ savepathuḥ sā sahasotpapāt /
GK19asvsau2u:602: pragṛhya bāhū virurāva coccairhṛdīva digdhābhihata kareṇuḥ // Saund_6.24 //
GK19asvsau2u:605: sā padmarāgaṃ vasanaṃ vasānā padmānanā padmadalāyatākṣī /
GK19asvsau2u:606: padmā vipadmā patiteva lakṣmīḥ śuśoṣa padmasragivātapena // Saund_6.26 //
GK19asvsau2u:607: saṃcintya sacintya guṇāṃśca bharturdīrghaṃ niśaśvāsa tatāma caiva /
GK19asvsau2u:608: vibhūṣaṇaśrīnihite prakoṣṭhe tāmre karāgre ca vinirdudhāva // Saund_6.27 //
GK19asvsau2u:609: na bhūṣaṇārtho mama saṃpratīti sā dikṣu cikṣepa vibhūṣaṇāni /
GK19asvsau2u:610: nirbhūṣaṇā sā patitā cakāśe viśīrṇapuṣpastabakā lateva // Saund_6.28 //
GK19asvsau2u:612: yatnācca vinyastatamālapatrau ruṣṭeva dhṛṣṭaṃ pramamājaṃ gaṇḍau // Saund_6.29 //
GK19asvsau2u:616: rukmāṅgapāde śayane mahārhe na śarma lebhe pariceṣṭamānā // Saund_6.31 //
GK19asvsau2u:617: sandṛśya bhartuśca vibhūṣaṇāni vāsāṃsi vīṇāprabhṛtīṃśca līlāḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:618: tamo viveśābhinanāda coccaiḥ paṅkāvatīrṇeva ca saṃsasāda // Saund_6.32 //
GK19asvsau2u:620: śokāgnināntarhṛdi dahyamānā vibhrāntacitteva tadā babhūva // Saund_6.33 //
GK19asvsau2u:621: ruroda mamlau virurāva jaglau babhrāma tasthau vilalāpa dadhyau /
GK19asvsau2u:622: cakāra roṣaṃ vicakāra mālyaṃ cakarta vaktraṃ vicakarṣa vastram // Saund_6.34 //
GK19asvsau2u:623: tāṃ cārudantīṃ prasabhaṃ rudantīṃ saṃśrutya nāryaḥ paramābhitaptāḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:625: bāṣpeṇa tāḥ klinnaviṣaṇṇavaktrā varṣeṇa padminya ivārdrapadmāḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:629: yā tatra tāsāṃ vacasopapannā mānyā ca tasyā vayasādhikā ca /
GK19asvsau2u:630: sā pṛṣṭhatastāṃ tu samāliliṅge pramṛjya cāśrūṇi vacāṃsyuvāca // Saund_6.38 //
GK19asvsau2u:631: rājarṣivadhvāstava nānurūpo dharmāśrite bhartari jātu śokaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:633: prāyeṇa mokṣāya viniḥsṛtānāṃ śākyarṣabhāṇāṃ viditāḥ striyaste /
GK19asvsau2u:634: tapovanānīva gṛhāṇi yāsāṃ sādhvīvrataṃ kāmavadāśritānām // Saund_6.40 //
GK19asvsau2u:635: yadyanyayā rūpaguṇādhikatvād bharttā hṛtaste kuru bāṣpamokṣam /
GK19asvsau2u:636: manasvinī rūpavatī guṇāḍhyā hṛdi kṣate kātra hi nāśru muñcet // Saund_6.41 //
GK19asvsau2u:637: athāpi kiṃcid vyasanaṃ prapanno mā caiva tad bhūt sadṛśo 'tra bāṣpaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:638: ato viśiṣṭaṃ na hi duḥkhamasti kulodgatāyāḥ patidevatāyāḥ // Saund_6.42 //
GK19asvsau2u:639: atha tvidānīṃ laḍitaḥ sukhena svasthaḥ phalastho vyasanānyadṛṣṭvā /
GK19asvsau2u:640: vītaspṛho dharmamanuprapannaḥ kiṃ viklavā rodiṣi harṣakāle // Saund_6.43 //
GK19asvsau2u:641: ityevamuktāpi bahuprakāraṃ snehāttayā naiva dhṛtiṃ cakāra /
GK19asvsau2u:642: athāparā tāṃ manaso 'nukūlaṃ kālopapannaṃ praṇayāduvāca // Saund_6.44 //
GK19asvsau2u:643: bravīmi satyaṃ suviniścitaṃ me prāptaṃ priyaṃ drakṣyasi śīghrameva /
GK19asvsau2u:644: tvayā vinā sthāsyati tatra nāsau sattvāśrayaścetanayeva hīnaḥ // Saund_6.45 //
GK19asvsau2u:645: aṅke 'pi lakṣmyā na sa nirvṛtaḥ syāt tvaṃ tasya pārśve yadi tatra na syāḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:646: āpatsu kṛcchrāsvapi cāgatāsu tvāṃ paśyatastasya bhavenna duḥkham // Saund_6.46 //
GK19asvsau2u:647: tvaṃ nirvṛtiṃ gaccha niyaccha bāṣpaṃ taptāśrumokṣāt parirakṣa cakṣuḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:648: yastasya bhāvastvayi yaśca rāgo na raṃsyate tvadvirahāt sa dharme // Saund_6.47 //
GK19asvsau2u:650: anātmanādāya gṛhonmukhasya punarvimoktuṃ ka ivāsti doṣaḥ // Saund_6.48 //
GK19asvsau2u:651: iti yuvatijanena sāntvyamānā hṛtahṛdayā ramaṇena sundarī sā /
GK19asvsau2u:652: dramiḍamabhimukhī pureva rambhā kṣitimagamat parivāritāpsarobhiḥ // Saund_6.49 //
GK19asvsau2u:653: saundarananda mahākāvye “bhāryāvilāpa” nāma ṣaṣṭha sarga samāpta /
GK19asvsau2u:656: liṅgaṃ tataḥ śāstṛvidhipradiṣṭaṃ gātreṇa bibhranna tu cetasā tat /
GK19asvsau2u:657: bhāryāgataireva manovitarkairjehrīyamāṇo na nananda nandaḥ // Saund_7.1 //
GK19asvsau2u:658: sa puṣpamāsasya ca puṣpalakṣmyā sarvābhisāreṇa ca puṣpaketoḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:659: yānīyabhāvena ca yauvanasya vihārasaṃstho na śamaṃ jagāma // Saund_7.2 //
GK19asvsau2u:661: bhṛśaṃ jajṛmbhe yugadīrghabāhurdhyātvā priyāṃ cāpamivācakarṣa // Saund_7.3 //
GK19asvsau2u:663: dīrghaṃ niśaśvāsa vicintya bhāryāṃ navagraho nāga ivāvaruddhaḥ // Saund_7.4 //
GK19asvsau2u:664: śokasya hartā śaraṇāgatānāṃ śokasya karttā pratigarvitānām /
GK19asvsau2u:665: aśokamālambya sa jātaśokaḥ priyāṃ priyāśokakavanāṃ śuśoca // Saund_7.5 //
GK19asvsau2u:666: priyāṃ priyāyāḥ pratanuṃ priyaṅguṃ niśāmya bhītāmiva niṣpatantīm /
GK19asvsau2u:667: sasmāra tāmaśrumukhīṃ sabāṣpaḥ priyāṃ priyaṅguprasavāvadātām // Saund_7.6 //
GK19asvsau2u:670: latāṃ praphullāmatimuktakasya cūtasya pārśve parirabhya jātām /
GK19asvsau2u:671: niśāmya cintāmagamattadaivaṃ śliṣṭā bhavenmāmapi sundarīti // Saund_7.8 //
GK19asvsau2u:672: puṣpotkarālā api nāgavṛkṣā dāntaiḥ samudgairiva hemagarbhaiḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:673: kāntāravṛkṣā iva duḥkhitasya na cakṣurācikṣipurasya tatra // Saund_7.9 //
GK19asvsau2u:674: gandhaṃ vamanto 'pi ca gandhaparṇā gandharvaveśyā iva gandhapūrṇāḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:675: tasyānyacittasya śugātmakasya ghrāṇaṃ na janhurhṛdayaṃ pratepuḥ // Saund_7.10 //
GK19asvsau2u:677: lelihyamānaiśca madhu dvirephaiḥ svanadvanaṃ tasya mano nunoda // Saund_7.11 //
GK19asvsau2u:679: kāmāgnināntarhṛdi dahyamāno vihāya dhairyaṃ vilalāpa tattat // Saund_7.12 //
GK19asvsau2u:680: adyāvagacchāmi suduṣkaraṃ te cakruḥ kariṣyanti ca kurvate ca /
GK19asvsau2u:681: tyaktvā priyāmaśrumukhīṃ tapo ye cerūścariṣyanti caranti caiva // Saund_7.13 //
GK19asvsau2u:682: tāvad dṛḍhaṃ bandhanamasti loke na dāravaṃ tāntavamāyasaṃ vā /
GK19asvsau2u:683: yāvad dṛḍhaṃ bandhanametadeva mukhaṃ calākṣaṃ lalitaṃ ca vākyam // Saund_7.14 //
GK19asvsau2u:684: chittvā ca bhittvā ca hi yānti tāni svapauruṣāccaiva suhṛdbalācca /
GK19asvsau2u:685: jñānācca raukṣyācca vinā vimoktuṃ na śakyate snehamayastu pāśaḥ // Saund_7.15 //
GK19asvsau2u:686: jñānaṃ na me tacca śamāya yat syānna na cāsti raukṣyaṃ karuṇātmako 'smi /
GK19asvsau2u:687: kāmātmakaścāsmi guruśca buddhaḥ sthito 'ntare cakragaterivāsmi // Saund_7.16 //
GK19asvsau2u:688: ahaṃ gṛhītvāpi hi bhikṣuliṅgaṃ bhrātṝṣiṇā dviguruṇānuśiṣṭaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:689: sarvāsvavasthāsu labhe na śāntiṃ priyāviyogādiva cakravākaḥ // Saund_7.17 //
GK19asvsau2u:690: adyāpi tanme hṛdi vartate ca yaddarpaṇe vyākulite mayā sā /
GK19asvsau2u:693: pāriplavākṣeṇa mukhena bālā tanme vaco 'dyāpi mano ruṇaddhi // Saund_7.19 //
GK19asvsau2u:694: buddhvāsanaṃ parvatanirjharasthaḥ svastho yathā dhyāyati bhikṣureṣaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:695: saktaḥ kvacinnāhamivaiṣa nūnaṃ śāntastathā tṛpta ivopaviṣṭaḥ // Saund_7.20 //
GK19asvsau2u:697: śāstraṃ yathābhyasyati caiṣa yuktaḥ śaṅke priyākarṣati nāsya cetaḥ // Saund_7.21 //
GK19asvsau2u:700: nirīkṣamāṇasya jalaṃ sapadmaṃ vanaṃ ca phullaṃ parapuṣṭajuṣṭam /
GK19asvsau2u:701: kasyāsti dhairyaṃ navayauvanasya māse madhau dharmasapatnabhūte // Saund_7.23 //
GK19asvsau2u:702: bhāvena garveṇa gatena lakṣmyā smitena kopena madena vāgbhiḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:703: jahruḥ striyo devanṛparṣisaṃghān kasmāddhi nāsmadvidhamākṣipeyuḥ // Saund_7.24 //
GK19asvsau2u:704: kāmābhibhūto hi hiraṇyaretāḥ svāhāṃ siṣeve madhavānahalyām /
GK19asvsau2u:705: sattvena sargeṇa ca tena hīnaḥ strinirjitaḥ kiṃ bata mānuṣo 'ham // Saund_7.25 //
GK19asvsau2u:706: sūryaḥ saraṇyūṃ prati jātarāgastatprītaye taṣṭa iti śrutaṃ naḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:707: ratamaśvabhūto 'śvavadhūṃ sametya yato 'śvinau tau janayāṃbabhūva // Saund_7.26 //
GK19asvsau2u:709: bahūni varṣāṇi babhūva yuddhaṃ kaḥ strīnimittaṃ na caledihānyaḥ // Saund_7.27 //
GK19asvsau2u:710: bheje śvapākīṃ munirakṣamālāṃ kāmādvasiṣṭhaśca sa sadvariṣṭhaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:711: yasyāṃ vivaśvāniva bhūjalādaḥ sutaḥ prasūto 'sya kapiñjalādaḥ // Saund_7.28 //
GK19asvsau2u:713: suto 'sya yasyāṃ suṣuve mahātmā dvaipāyano vedavibhāgakarttā // Saund_7.29 //
GK19asvsau2u:714: dvaipāyano dharmaparāyaṇaśca reme samaṃ kāśiṣu veśyavadhvā /
GK19asvsau2u:715: yayā hato 'bhūccalanūpureṇa pādena vidyullatayeva meghaḥ // Saund_7.30 //
GK19asvsau2u:717: sārasvato yatra suto 'sya jajñe naṣṭasya vedasya punaḥpravaktā // Saund_7.31 //
GK19asvsau2u:718: tathā nṛparṣerdilīpasya yajñe svargastriyāṃ kāśyapa āgatāsthaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:719: sruvaṃ gṛhītvā sravadātmatejaścikṣepa vahrāvasito yato 'bhūt // Saund_7.32 //
GK19asvsau2u:721: dhīmattaraṃ yatra rathītaraṃ sa sāraṅgajuṣṭaṃ janayāmbabhūva // Saund_7.33 //
GK19asvsau2u:722: niśāmya śāntāṃ naradevakanyāṃ vane 'pi śānte 'pi ca vartamānaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:723: cacāla dhairyānmuniṛṣyaśrṛṅgaḥ śailo mahīkampa ivoccaśrṛṅgaḥ // Saund_7.34 //
GK19asvsau2u:724: brahmarṣibhāvārthamapāsya rājyaṃ bheje vanaṃ yo viṣayeṣvanāsthaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:725: sa gādhijaścāpahṛto ghṛtācyā samā daśaikaṃ divasaṃ viveda // Saund_7.35 //
GK19asvsau2u:726: tathaiva kandarpaśarābhimṛṣṭo rambhāṃ prati sthūlaśirā mumūrccha /
GK19asvsau2u:729: saṃdṛśya saṃdṛśya jaghāna sarpān priyaṃ na roṣeṇa tapo rarakṣa // Saund_7.37 //
GK19asvsau2u:732: rakto girermūrdhani menakāyāṃ kāmātmakatvācca sa tālajaṅghaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:733: pādena viśvāvasunā saroṣaṃ vajreṇa hintāla ivābhijaghne // Saund_7.39 //
GK19asvsau2u:735: janhuśca gaṅgāṃ nṛpatirbhujābhyāṃ rurodha maināka ivācalendraḥ // Saund_7.40 //
GK19asvsau2u:737: kulapradīpaḥ pratipasya sūnuḥ śrīmattanuḥ śantanurasvatantraḥ // Saund_7.41 //
GK19asvsau2u:738: hṛtāṃ ca saunandakinānu 'śocan prāptāmivorvīṃ striyamurvaśīṃ tām /
GK19asvsau2u:739: sadvṛttavarmā kila somavarmā babhrāma citodbhavabhinnavarmā // Saund_7.42 //
GK19asvsau2u:740: bhāryāṃ mṛtāṃ cānumamāra rājā bhīmaprabhāvo bhuvi bhīmakaḥ saḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:741: balena senāka iti prakāśaḥ senāpatirdeva ivāttasenaḥ // Saund_7.43 //
GK19asvsau2u:742: svargaṃ gate bhartari śantanau ca kālīṃ jihīrṣan janamejayaḥ saḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:743: avāpa bhīṣmāt samavetya mṛtyuṃ na tadgataṃ manmathamutsasarja // Saund_7.44 //
GK19asvsau2u:745: jagāma mādrīṃ na maharṣiśāpādasevyasevī vimamarśa mṛtyum // Saund_7.45 //
GK19asvsau2u:746: evaṃvidhā devanṛparṣisaṅghāḥ strīṇāṃ vaśaṃ kāmavaśena jagmuḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:747: dhiyā ca sāreṇa ca durbalaḥ san priyāmapaśyan kimu viklavo 'ham // Saund_7.46 //
GK19asvsau2u:748: yāsyāmi tasmād gṛhameva bhūyaḥ kāmaṃ kariṣye vidhivat sakāmam /
GK19asvsau2u:749: na hyanyacittasya calendriyasya liṅgaṃ kṣamaṃ dharmapathāccyutasya // Saund_7.47 //
GK19asvsau2u:750: pāṇau kapālamavadhārya vidhāya mauṇḍyaṃ mānaṃ nidhāya vikṛtaṃ paridhāya vāsaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:751: yasyoddhavo na dhṛtirasti na śāntirasti citrapradīpa iva so 'sti ca nāsti caiva // Saund_7.48 //
GK19asvsau2u:752: yo niḥsṛtaśca na ca niḥsṛtakāmarāgaḥ kāṣāyamudvahati yo na ca niṣkaṣāyaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:753: pātraṃ bibharti ca guṇairna ca pātrabhūto liṅgaṃ vahannapi sa naiva gṛhī na bhikṣuḥ // Saund_7.49 //
GK19asvsau2u:754: na nyāyyamanvayavataḥ parigṛhya liṅgaṃ bhūyo vimoktumiti yo 'pi hi me vicāraḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:755: so 'pi praṇaśyati vicintya nṛpapravīrāstānye tapovanamapāsya gṛhāṇyatīyuḥ // Saund_7.50 //
GK19asvsau2u:756: śālbādhipo hi sasuto 'pi tathāmbarīṣo rāmo 'ndha eva sa ca sāṃskṛtirantidevaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:757: cīrāṇyapāsya dadhire punaraṃśukāni chittvā jaṭāśca kuṭilā mukuṭāni babhruḥ // Saund_7.51 //
GK19asvsau2u:758: tasmād bhikṣārthaṃ mama gururito yāvadeva prayātas
GK19asvsau2u:760: pūjyaṃ liṅgaṃ hi skhalitamanaso bibhrataḥ kliṣṭabuddher
GK19asvsau2u:762: saundarananda mahākāvye “nandavilāpa” nāma saptama sarga samāpta /
GK19asvsau2u:766: abhigamya śivena cakṣuṣā śramaṇaḥ kaściduvāca maitrayā // Saund_8.1 //
GK19asvsau2u:767: kimidaṃ mukhamaśrudurdinaṃ hṛdayasthaṃ vivṛṇoti te tamaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:768: dhṛtimehi niyaccha vikriyāṃ na hi bāṣpaśca śamaśca śobhate // Saund_8.2 //
GK19asvsau2u:769: dvividhā samudeti vedanā niyataṃ cetasi deha eva ca /
GK19asvsau2u:771: tadiyaṃ yadi kāyikī rujā bhiṣaje tūrṇamanūnamucyatām /
GK19asvsau2u:773: atha duḥkhamidaṃ manomayaṃ vada vakṣyāmi yadatra bheṣajam /
GK19asvsau2u:774: manaso hi rajastamasvino bhiṣajo 'dhyātmavidaḥ parīkṣakāḥ // Saund_8.5 //
GK19asvsau2u:775: nikhilena ca satyamucyatāṃ yadi vācyaṃ mayi saumya manyase /
GK19asvsau2u:776: gatayo vividhā hi cetasāṃ bahuguhyāni mahākulāni ca // Saund_8.6 //
GK19asvsau2u:777: iti tena sa coditastadā vyavasāyaṃ pravivakṣurātmanaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:778: avalambya kare kareṇa taṃ praviveśānyatarad vanāntaram // Saund_8.7 //
GK19asvsau2u:779: atha tatra śucau latāgṛhe kusumodgāriṇi tau niṣedatuḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:782: śrutavāgviśadāya bhikṣave viduṣā pravrajitena durvacam // Saund_8.9 //
GK19asvsau2u:783: sadṛśaṃ yadi dharmacāriṇaḥ satataṃ prāṇiṣu maitracetasaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:784: adhṛtau yadiyaṃ hitaiṣitā mayi te syāt karuṇātmanaḥ sataḥ // Saund_8.10 //
GK19asvsau2u:785: ata eva ca me viśeṣataḥ pravivakṣā kṣamavādini tvayi /
GK19asvsau2u:786: na hi bhāvamimaṃ calātmane kathayeyaṃ bruvate 'pyasādhave // Saund_8.11 //
GK19asvsau2u:787: tadidaṃ śrṛṇu me samāsato na rame dharmavidhāvṛte priyām /
GK19asvsau2u:788: girisānuṣu kāminīmṛte kṛtaretā iva kinnaraścaran // Saund_8.12 //
GK19asvsau2u:789: vanavāsasukhāt parāṅmukhaḥ prayiyāsā gṛhameva yena me /
GK19asvsau2u:790: na hi śarma labhe tayā binā nṛpatirhīna ivottamaśriyā // Saund_8.13 //
GK19asvsau2u:791: atha tasya niśamya tadvacaḥ priyabhāryābhimukhasya śocataḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:792: śramaṇaḥ sa śiraḥ prakampayannijagādātmagataṃ śanairidam // Saund_8.14 //
GK19asvsau2u:793: kṛpaṇaṃ bata yūthalālaso mahato vyādhabhayād viniḥsṛtaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:794: pravivikṣati vāgurāṃ mṛgaścapalo gītaraveṇa vañcitaḥ // Saund_8.15 //
GK19asvsau2u:795: vihagaḥ khalu jālasaṃvṛto hitakāmena janena mokṣitaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:796: vicaran phalapuṣpavadvanaṃ pravivikṣuḥ svayameva pañcaram // Saund_8.16 //
GK19asvsau2u:798: jalatarṣavaśena tāṃ punaḥ saritaṃ grāhavatīṃ titīrṣati // Saund_8.17 //
GK19asvsau2u:799: śaraṇe sabhujaṅgame svapan pratibuddhena pareṇa bodhitaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:800: taruṇaḥ khalu jātavibhramaḥ svayamugraṃ bhujagaṃ jighṛkṣati // Saund_8.18 //
GK19asvsau2u:802: punaricchati nīḍatṛṣṇayā patituṃ tatra gatavyatho dvijaḥ // Saund_8.19 //
GK19asvsau2u:803: avaśaḥ khalu kāmamūrcchayā priyayā śyenabhayād vinākṛtaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:804: na dhṛtiṃ samupaiti na hriyaṃ karuṇaṃ jīvati jīvajīvakaḥ // Saund_8.20 //
GK19asvsau2u:805: akṛtātmatayā tṛṣānvito ghṛṇayā caiva dhiyā ca varjitaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:806: aśanaṃ khalu vāntamātmanā kṛpaṇaḥ śvā punarattumicchati // Saund_8.21 //
GK19asvsau2u:808: śramaṇaḥ sa hitābhikāṅkṣayā guṇavad vākyamuvāca vipriyam // Saund_8.22 //
GK19asvsau2u:810: upapannamalabdhacakṣuṣo na ratiḥ śreyasi ced bhavettava // Saund_8.23 //
GK19asvsau2u:814: śamakarmasu yuktacetasaḥ kṛtabuddhena ratirna vidyate // Saund_8.25 //
GK19asvsau2u:815: ramate tṛṣito dhanaśriyā ramate kāmasukhena bāliśaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:816: ramate praśamena sajjanaḥ paribhogān paribhūya vidyayā // Saund_8.26 //
GK19asvsau2u:818: sadṛśī na gṛhāya cetanā praṇatirvāyuvaśad gireriva // Saund_8.27 //
GK19asvsau2u:820: upaśāntipathe śive sthitaḥ spṛhayeddoṣavate gṛhāya saḥ // Saund_8.28 //
GK19asvsau2u:821: vyasanābhihato yathā viśet parimuktaḥ punareva bandhanam /
GK19asvsau2u:822: samupetya vanaṃ tathā punargṛhasaṃjñaṃ mṛgayeta bandhanam // Saund_8.29 //
GK19asvsau2u:823: puruṣaśca vihāya yaḥ kaliṃ punaricchet kalimeva sevitum /
GK19asvsau2u:824: sa vihāya bhajeta bāliśaḥ kalibhūtāmajitendriyaḥ priyām // Saund_8.30 //
GK19asvsau2u:825: saviṣā iva saṃśritā latāḥ parimṛṣṭā iva soragā guhāḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:826: vivṛtā iva cāsayo dhṛtā vyasanāntā hi bhavanti yoṣitaḥ // Saund_8.31 //
GK19asvsau2u:827: pramadāḥ samadā madapradāḥ pramadā vitamadā bhayapradāḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:828: iti doṣabhayāvahāśca tāḥ kathamarhanti niṣevaṇaṃ nu tāḥ // Saund_8.32 //
GK19asvsau2u:829: svajanaḥ svajanena bhidyate suhadaścāpi suhṛjjanena yat /
GK19asvsau2u:832: praviśanti ca yaccamūmukhaṃ rabhasāstatra nimittamaṅganāḥ // Saund_8.34 //
GK19asvsau2u:833: vacanena haranti valgunā niśitena praharanti cetasā /
GK19asvsau2u:834: madhu tiṣṭhati vāci yoṣitāṃ hṛdaye hālahalaṃ mahadviṣaśam // Saund_8.35 //
GK19asvsau2u:835: pradahan dahano 'pi gṛhyate viśarīraḥ pavano 'pi gṛhyate /
GK19asvsau2u:836: kupito bhujago 'pi gṛhyate pramadānāṃ tu mano na gṛhyate // Saund_8.36 //
GK19asvsau2u:837: na vapurvimṛśanti na śriyaṃ na matiṃ nāpi kulaṃ na vikramam /
GK19asvsau2u:838: praharantyaviśeṣataḥ striyaḥ sarito grāhakulākulā iva // Saund_8.37 //
GK19asvsau2u:839: na vaco madhuraṃ na lālanaṃ smarati strī na ca sauhṛdaṃ kvacit /
GK19asvsau2u:840: kalitā vanitaiva cañcalā tadihāriṣviva nāvalambyate // Saund_8.38 //
GK19asvsau2u:841: adadatsu bhavanti narmadāḥ pradadatsu praviśanti vibhramam /
GK19asvsau2u:842: praṇateṣu bhavanti garvitāḥ pramadāstṛptatarāśca māniṣu // Saund_8.39 //
GK19asvsau2u:843: guṇavatsu caranti bhartṛvad guṇahīneṣu caranti putravat /
GK19asvsau2u:844: dhanavatsu caranti tṛṣṇayā dhanahīneṣu carantyavajñayā // Saund_8.40 //
GK19asvsau2u:845: viṣayād viṣayāntaraṃ gatā pracaratyeva yathā hṛtāpi gau /
GK19asvsau2u:848: api bibhrati caiva yantraṇā na tu bhāvena vahanti sauhṛdam // Saund_8.42 //
GK19asvsau2u:849: ramayanti patīn kathañcana pramadā yāḥ patidevatāḥ kvacit /
GK19asvsau2u:850: calacittatayā sahastraśo ramayante hṛdayaṃ svameva tāḥ // Saund_8.43 //
GK19asvsau2u:851: śvapacaṃ kila senajitsutā cakame mīnaripuṃ kumudvatī /
GK19asvsau2u:856: kathamarhati tāsu paṇḍito hṛdayaṃ sañjayituṃ calātmasu // Saund_8.46 //
GK19asvsau2u:857: atha sūkṣmamatidvayāśivaṃ laghu tāsāṃ hṛdayaṃ na paśyasi /
GK19asvsau2u:858: kimu kāyamasadgṛhaṃ sravad vanitānāmaśuciṃ na paśyasi // Saund_8.47 //
GK19asvsau2u:860: aśubhaṃ tamasāvṛtekṣaṇaḥ śubhato gacchasi nāvagacchasi // Saund_8.48 //
GK19asvsau2u:861: athavā samavaiṣi tattanūmaśubhāṃ tvaṃ na tu saṃvidasti te /
GK19asvsau2u:862: surabhiṃ vidadhāsi hi kriyāmaśucestatprabhavasya śāntaye // Saund_8.49 //
GK19asvsau2u:864: yadi sādhu kimatra yoṣitāṃ sahajaṃ tāsu vicīyatāṃ śuci // Saund_8.50 //
GK19asvsau2u:866: yadi sā tava sundarī bhavenniyataṃ te 'dya na sundarī bhavet // Saund_8.51 //
GK19asvsau2u:867: stravatīmaśuciṃ spṛśecca kaḥ saghṛṇo jarjarabhāṇḍavat striyam /
GK19asvsau2u:868: yadi kevalayā tvacāvṛtā na bhavenmakṣikapatramātrayā // Saund_8.52 //
GK19asvsau2u:870: madanena ca kṛṣyase balādaghṛṇaḥ khalvadhṛtiśca manmathaḥ // Saund_8.53 //
GK19asvsau2u:872: avicakṣaṇa kiṃ na paśyasi prakṛtiṃ ca prabhavaṃ ca yoṣitām // Saund_8.54 //
GK19asvsau2u:874: capalaṃ bhavanotsukaṃ manaḥ pratisaṃkhyānabalena vāryatām // Saund_8.55 //
GK19asvsau2u:875: śrutavān matimān kulodgataḥ paramasya praśamasya bhājanam /
GK19asvsau2u:876: upagamya yathā tathā punarna hi bhettuṃ niyamaṃ tvamarhasi // Saund_8.56 //
GK19asvsau2u:878: nidhanamapi varaṃ sthirātmanaścyutavinayasya na caiva jīvitam // Saund_8.57 //
GK19asvsau2u:883: hāsyo yathā ca paramābharaṇāmbarastrag bhaikṣaṃ caran dhṛtadhanuścalacitramauliḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:884: vairūpyamabhyupagataḥ parapiṇḍabhojī hāsyastathā gṛhasukhābhimukhaḥ satṛṣṇaḥ // Saund_8.59 //
GK19asvsau2u:888: vanaṃ śāntaṃ hitvā gṛhamabhilaṣet kāmatṛṣitaḥ // Saund_8.60 //
GK19asvsau2u:891: yathā hanti vyāghraḥ śiśurapi gṛhīto gṛhagataḥ
GK19asvsau2u:894: matvā kāmasukhaṃ nadījalacalaṃ kleśāya śokāya ca /
GK19asvsau2u:897: saundarananda mahākāvye “strīvighna” nāma aṣṭama sarga samāpta /
GK19asvsau2u:900: athaivamukto 'pi sa tena bhikṣuṇā jagāma naivopaśamaṃ priyāṃ prati /
GK19asvsau2u:901: tathā hi tāmeva tadā sa cintayan na tasya śuśrāva visaṃjñavad vacaḥ // Saund_9.1 //
GK19asvsau2u:902: yathā hi vaidyasya cikīrṣataḥ śivaṃ vaco na gṛṇhāti mumūrṣurāturaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:903: tathaiva matto balarūpayauvanairhitaṃ na jagrāha sa tasya tadvacaḥ // Saund_9.2 //
GK19asvsau2u:904: na cātra citraṃ yadi rāgapāpmanā mano 'bhibhūyeta tamovṛtātmanaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:905: narasya pāpmā hi tadā nivartate yadā bhavatyantagataṃ tamastanu // Saund_9.3 //
GK19asvsau2u:906: tatastathākṣiptamavekṣya taṃ tadā balena rūpeṇa ca yauvanena ca /
GK19asvsau2u:907: gṛhaprayāṇaṃ prati ca vyavasthitaṃ śaśāsa nandaṃ śramaṇaḥ sa śāntaye // Saund_9.4 //
GK19asvsau2u:908: balaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca navaṃ ca yauvanaṃ tathāvagacchāmi yathāvagacchasi /
GK19asvsau2u:909: ahaṃ tvidaṃ te trayamavyavasthitaṃ yathāvabuddhye na tathāvabudhyase // Saund_9.5 //
GK19asvsau2u:911: na vetsi dehaṃ jalaphenadurbalaṃ balasthatāmātmani yena manyase // Saund_9.6 //
GK19asvsau2u:913: śarīramāsannavipatti dṛśyate bale 'bhimānastava kena hetunā // Saund_9.7 //
GK19asvsau2u:915: jalaṃ śucau māsa ivārkaraśmibhiḥ kṣayaṃ vrajan kiṃ baladṛpta manyase // Saund_9.8 //
GK19asvsau2u:917: ajasramārtaṃ satatapratikriyaṃ balānvito 'smīti kathaṃ vihanyase // Saund_9.9 //
GK19asvsau2u:918: yathā ghaṭaṃ mṛnmayamāmamāśrito narastitīrṣet kṣubhitaṃ mahārṇavam /
GK19asvsau2u:919: samucchrayaṃ tadvadasāramudvarahan balaṃ vyavasyed viṣayārthamudyataḥ // Saund_9.10 //
GK19asvsau2u:920: śarīramāmādapi mṛnmayād ghaṭādidaṃ tu niḥsāratamaṃ mataṃ mama /
GK19asvsau2u:921: ciraṃ hi tiṣṭhed vidhivad dhṛto ghaṭaḥ samucchrayo 'yaṃ sudhṛto 'pi bhidyate // Saund_9.11 //
GK19asvsau2u:922: yadāmbubhūvāyvanalāśca dhātavaḥ sadā viruddhā viṣamā ivoragāḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:923: bhavantyanarthāya śarīramāśritāḥ kathaṃ balaṃ rogavidho vyavasyasi // Saund_9.12 //
GK19asvsau2u:924: prayānti mantraiḥ praśamaṃ bhujaṅgamā na mantrasādhyastu bhavanti dhātavaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:925: kvacicca kaṃcicca daśanti pannagāḥ sadā ca sarvaṃ ca tudanti dhātavaḥ // Saund_9.13 //
GK19asvsau2u:927: na marṣayatyekamapi vyatikramaṃ yato mahāśīviṣavat prakupyati // Saund_9.14 //
GK19asvsau2u:928: yadā himārto jvalanaṃ niṣevate himaṃ nidādhābhihato 'bhikāṅkṣati /
GK19asvsau2u:929: kṣudhānvito 'nnaṃ salilaṃ tṛṣānvito balaṃ kutaḥ kiṃ ca kathaṃ ca kasya ca // Saund_9.15 //
GK19asvsau2u:933: cakarta bāhūn yudhi yasya bhārgavaḥ mahānti śrṛṅgāṇyaśanirgiretiva // Saund_9.17 //
GK19asvsau2u:934: kva tad valaṃ kaṃsavikarṣiṇo haresturaṅgarājasya puṭāvabhedinaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:935: yamekabāṇena nijaghnivān jarāḥ kramāgatā rūpamivottamaṃ jarā // Saund_9.18 //
GK19asvsau2u:936: diteḥ sutasyāmararoṣakāriṇaścamūrucervā namuceḥ kva tad balam /
GK19asvsau2u:937: yamāhave kruddhamivāntakaṃ sthitaṃ jaghāna phenāvayavena vāsavaḥ // Saund_9.19 //
GK19asvsau2u:938: balaṃ kurūṇāṃ kva ca tattadābhavad yudhi jvalitvā tarasaujasā ca ye /
GK19asvsau2u:939: samitsamiddhā jvalanā ivādhvare hatāsavo bhasmani paryavasthitāḥ // Saund_9.20 //
GK19asvsau2u:941: jagajjarāmṛtyuvaśaṃ vicārayan bale 'bhimānaṃ na vidhātumarhasi // Saund_9.21 //
GK19asvsau2u:942: balaṃ mahad yadi vā na manyase kuruṣva yuddhaṃ saha tāvadindriyaiḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:943: jayaśca te 'trāsti mahacca te balaṃ parājayaśced vitathaṃ ca te balam // Saund_9.22 //
GK19asvsau2u:944: tathā hi vīrāḥ puruṣā na te matā jayanti ye sāśvarathadvipānarīn
GK19asvsau2u:945: yathā matā vīratarā manīṣiṇo jayanti lolāni ṣaḍindriyāṇi ye // Saund_9.23 //
GK19asvsau2u:946: ahaṃ vapuṣmāniti yacca manyase vicakṣaṇaṃ naitadidaṃ ca gṛhyatām /
GK19asvsau2u:947: kva tadvapuḥ sā ca vapuṣmatī tanurgadasya śāmbasya ca sāraṇasya ca // Saund_9.24 //
GK19asvsau2u:948: yathā mayūraścalacitracandrako bibharti rūpaṃ guṇavat svabhāvataḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:949: śarīrasaṃskāraguṇādṛte tathā bibharti rūpaṃ yadi rūpavānasi // Saund_9.25 //
GK19asvsau2u:950: yadi pratīpaṃ vṛṇuyānna vāsasā na śaucakāle yadi saṃspṛśedapaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:951: mṛjāviśeṣaṃ yadi nādadīta vā vapurvapuṣman vada kīdṛśaṃ bhavet // Saund_9.26 //
GK19asvsau2u:952: navaṃ vayaścātmagataṃ niśāmya yadgṛ honmukhaṃ te viṣayāptaye manaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:953: niyaccha tacchailanadīrayopamaṃ drutaṃ hi gacchatyanivarti yauvanam // Saund_9.27 //
GK19asvsau2u:954: ṛturvyatītaḥ parivartate punaḥ kṣayaṃ prayātaḥ punareti candramāḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:955: gataṃ gataṃ naiva tu saṃnivartate jalaṃ nadīnāṃ ca nṛṇāṃ ca yauvanam // Saund_9.28 //
GK19asvsau2u:957: yadā mukhaṃ drakṣyasi jarjaraṃ tadā jarābhibhūto vimado bhaviṣyasi // Saund_9.29 //
GK19asvsau2u:958: niṣevya pānaṃ madanīyamuttamaṃ niśāvivāseṣu cirād vimādyati /
GK19asvsau2u:959: narastu matto balarūpayouvanairna kaścidaprāpya jarāṃ vimādyati // Saund_9.30 //
GK19asvsau2u:961: tathā jarāyantranipīḍitā tanurnipītasārā maraṇāya tiṣṭhati // Saund_9.31 //
GK19asvsau2u:962: yathā hi nṛbhyāṃ karapatramīritaṃ samucchritaṃ dāru bhinattyanekadhā /
GK19asvsau2u:964: smṛteḥ pramoṣo vapuṣaḥ parābhavo rateḥ kṣayo vācchruticakṣuṣāṃ grahaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:965: śramasya yonirbalavīryayorvadho jarāsamo nāsti śarīriṇāṃ ripuḥ // Saund_9.33 //
GK19asvsau2u:966: idaṃ viditvā nidhanasya daiśikaṃ jarābhidhānaṃ jagato mahadbhayam /
GK19asvsau2u:967: ahaṃ vapuṣmān balavān yuveti vā na mānamāroḍhumanāryamarhasi // Saund_9.34 //
GK19asvsau2u:968: ahaṃ mametyeva ca raktacetasāṃ śarīrasaṃjñā tava yaḥ kalau grahaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:969: tamutsṛjaivaṃ yadi śāmyatā bhaved bhayaṃ hyahaṃ ceti mameti cārchati // Saund_9.35 //
GK19asvsau2u:970: yadā śarīre na vaśo 'sti kasyacinnirasyamāne vividhairupaplavaiḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:971: kathaṃ kṣamaṃ vettumahaṃ mameti vā śarīrasaṃjñaṃ gṛhamāpadāmidam // Saund_9.36 //
GK19asvsau2u:972: sapannage yaḥ kugṛhe sadāśucau rameta nityaṃ pratisaṃskṛte 'bale /
GK19asvsau2u:973: sa duṣṭadhātāvaśucau calācale rameta kāye viparītadarśanaḥ // Saund_9.37 //
GK19asvsau2u:974: yathā prajābhyaḥ kunṛpo balād balīn haratyaśeṣaṃ ca na cābhirakṣati /
GK19asvsau2u:975: tathaiva kāyo vasanādisādhanaṃ haratyaśeṣaṃ ca na cānuvartate // Saund_9.38 //
GK19asvsau2u:976: yathā prarohanti tṛṇānyayatnataḥ kṣitau prayatnāt tu bhavanti śālayaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:977: tathaiva duḥkhāni bhavantyayatnataḥ sukhāni yatnena bhavanti vā na vā // Saund_9.39 //
GK19asvsau2u:978: śarīramārtaṃ parikarṣataścalaṃ na cāsti kiñcit paramārthataḥ sukham /
GK19asvsau2u:979: sukhaṃ hi duḥkhapratikārasevayā sthite ca duḥkhe tanuni vyavasyati // Saund_9.40 //
GK19asvsau2u:981: tathānapekṣyātmani duḥkhamāgataṃ na vidyate kiñcana kasyacit sukhaṃ // Saund_9.41 //
GK19asvsau2u:983: dravatphalebhyo dhṛtiraśmibhirmano nigṛhyatāṃ gauriva śasyalālasā // Saund_9.42 //
GK19asvsau2u:984: na kāmabhogā hi bhavanti tṛptaye havīṃṣi dīptasya vibhāvasoriva /
GK19asvsau2u:985: yathā yathā kāmasukheṣu vartate tathā tathecchā viṣayeṣu varddhate // Saund_9.43 //
GK19asvsau2u:986: yathā ca kuṣṭhavyasanena duḥkhitaḥ pratāpanānnaiva śamaṃ nigacchati /
GK19asvsau2u:988: yathā hi bhaiṣajyasukhābhikāṅkṣayā bhajeta rogānna bhajeta tatkṣamam /
GK19asvsau2u:989: tathā śarīre bahuduḥkhabhājane rameta mohād viṣayābhikāṅkṣayā // Saund_9.45 //
GK19asvsau2u:990: anarthakāmaḥ puruṣasya yo janaḥ sa tasya śatruḥ kila tena karmaṇā /
GK19asvsau2u:991: anarthamūlā viṣayāśca kevalā nanu praheyā viṣamā yathārayaḥ // Saund_9.46 //
GK19asvsau2u:992: ihaiva bhūtvā ripavo vadhātmakāḥ prayānti kāle puruṣasya mitratāṃ /
GK19asvsau2u:993: paratra caiveha ca duḥkhahetavo bhavanti kāmā na tu kasyacicchivāḥ // Saund_9.47 //
GK19asvsau2u:994: yathopayuktaṃ rasavarṇagandhavad vadhāya kimpākaphalaṃ na puṣṭaye /
GK19asvsau2u:995: niṣevyamāṇā viṣayāścalātmano bhavantyanarthāya tathā na bhūtaye // Saund_9.48 //
GK19asvsau2u:997: juṣasva me sajjanasaṃmataṃ mataṃ pracakṣva vā niścayamud giran giram // Saund_9.49 //
GK19asvsau2u:998: iti hitamapi bahvapīdamuktaḥ śrutamahatā śramaṇena tena nandaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:999: na dhṛtimupayayau na śarma lebhe dvirada ivātimado madāndhacetāḥ // Saund_9.50 //
GK19asvsau2u:1000: nandasya bhāvamavagamya tataḥ sa bhikṣuḥ pāriplavaṃ gṛhasukhābhimukhaṃ na dharme /
GK19asvsau2u:1002: saundarananda mahākāvye “abhimānanindā” nāma navama sarga samāpta /
GK19asvsau2u:1005: śrutvā tataḥ sadvratamutsisṛkṣuṃ bhāryāṃ didṛkṣuṃ bhavanaṃ vivikṣum /
GK19asvsau2u:1008: sa hrīmate hrīvinato jagāda svaṃ niścayaṃ niścayakovidāya // Saund_10.2 //
GK19asvsau2u:1009: nandaṃ viditvā sugatastatastaṃ bhāryābhidhāne tamasi bhramantam /
GK19asvsau2u:1010: pāṇau gṛhītvā viyadutpapāta malaṃ jale sādhurivojjihīrṣuḥ // Saund_10.3 //
GK19asvsau2u:1016: agamyapārasya nirāśrayasya tau tasthaturdvīpa ivāmbarasya // Saund_10.6 //
GK19asvsau2u:1017: śāntendriye tatra munau sthite tu savismayaṃ dikṣu dadarśa nandaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1018: darīśca kuñjāṃśca vanaukasaśca vibhūṣaṇaṃ rakṣaṇameva cādreḥ // Saund_10.7 //
GK19asvsau2u:1019: bahvāyate tatra site hi śṛṅge saṃkṣiptabarhaḥ śayito mayūraḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1024: babhau gireḥ prasravaṇa pipāsurditsan pitṛbhyo 'mbha ivāvatīrṇaḥ // Saund_10.10 //
GK19asvsau2u:1025: calatkadambe himavannitambe tarau pralambe camaro lalambe /
GK19asvsau2u:1026: chettuṃ vilagnaṃ na śaśāka bālaṃ kulodgatāṃ prītimivāryavṛttaḥ // Saund_10.11 //
GK19asvsau2u:1030: vṛndāni rejurdiśi kinnarīṇāṃ puṣpotkacānāmiva vallarīṇām // Saund_10.13 //
GK19asvsau2u:1035: kā nanda rūpeṇa ca ceṣṭayā ca saṃpaśyataścārutarā matā te /
GK19asvsau2u:1036: eṣā mṛgī vaikavipannadṛṣṭiḥ sa vā jano yatra gatā taveṣṭiḥ // Saund_10.16 //
GK19asvsau2u:1037: ityevamuktaḥ sugatena nandaḥ kṛtvā smitaṃ kiṃcididaṃ jagāda /
GK19asvsau2u:1038: kva cottamastrī bhagavan vadhūste mṛgī nagakleśakarī kva caiṣā // Saund_10.17 //
GK19asvsau2u:1039: tato munistasya niśamya vākyaṃ hetvantaraṃ kiṃcidavekṣamāṇaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1040: ālambya nandaṃ prayayau tathaiva krīḍāvanaṃ vajradharasya rājñaḥ // Saund_10.18 //
GK19asvsau2u:1041: ṛtāvṛtāvākṛtimeka eke kṣaṇe kṣaṇe bibhrati yatra vṛkṣāḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1042: citrāṃ samastāmapi kecidanye ṣaṇṇāmṛtūnāṃ śriyamudvahanti // Saund_10.19 //
GK19asvsau2u:1043: puṣyanti kecit surabhīrudārā mālāḥ srajaśca granthitā vicitrāḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1045: raktāni phullāḥ kamalāni yatra pradīpavṛkṣā iva bhānti vṛkṣāḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1046: praphullanīlotpalarohiṇo 'nye sonmīlitākṣā eva bhānti vṛkṣāḥ // Saund_10.21 //
GK19asvsau2u:1048: atāntavānyekaghanāni yatra sūkṣmāṇi vāsāṃsi phalanti vṛkṣāḥ // Saund_10.22 //
GK19asvsau2u:1050: evaṃvidhānyābharaṇāni yatra svargānurūpāṇi phalanti vṛkṣāḥ // Saund_10.23 //
GK19asvsau2u:1053: yatrāyatāṃścaiva tatāṃśca tāṃstān vādyasya hetūn suṣirān ghanāṃśca /
GK19asvsau2u:1056: ākramya māhātmyaguṇairvirājan rājāyate yatra sa pārijātaḥ // Saund_10.26 //
GK19asvsau2u:1058: evaṃvidhā yatra sadānuvṛttā divaukasāṃ bhogavidhānavṛkṣāḥ // Saund_10.27 //
GK19asvsau2u:1066: bhramanti dṛṣṭīrvapuṣākṣipantaḥ svanaiḥ śubhairapsaraso harantaḥ // Saund_10.31 //
GK19asvsau2u:1068: svaiḥ karmabhirhīnaviśiṣṭamadhyāḥ svayaṃprabhāḥ puṇyakṛto ramante // Saund_10.32 //
GK19asvsau2u:1070: manāṃsi khinnāni tapodhanānāṃ haranti yatrāpsaraso laḍantyaḥ // Saund_10.33 //
GK19asvsau2u:1071: nityotsavaṃ taṃ ca niśāmya lokaṃ nistandrinidrāratiśokarogam /
GK19asvsau2u:1072: nando jarāmṛtyuvaśaṃ sadārtaṃ mene śmaśānapratimaṃ nṛlokam // Saund_10.34 //
GK19asvsau2u:1073: aindraṃ vanaṃ tacca dadarśa nandaḥ samantato vismayaphulladṛṣṭiḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1075: sadā yuvatyo madanaikakāryāḥ sādhāraṇāḥ puṇyakṛtāṃ vihārāḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1081: tāḥ niḥsṛtāḥ prekṣya vanāntarebhyastaḍitpatākā iva toyadebhyaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1082: nandasya rāgeṇa tanurvivepe jale cale candramasaḥ prabheva // Saund_10.39 //
GK19asvsau2u:1083: vapuśca divyaṃ lalitāśca ceṣṭāstataḥ sa tāsāṃ manasā jahāra /
GK19asvsau2u:1084: kautūhalāvarjitayā ca dṛṣṭyā saṃśleṣatarṣādiva jātarāgaḥ // Saund_10.40 //
GK19asvsau2u:1086: lolendriyāśvena manorathena jehrīyamāṇo na dhṛtiṃ cakāra // Saund_10.41 //
GK19asvsau2u:1087: yathā manuṣyo malinaṃ hi vāsaḥ kṣāreṇa bhūyo malinīkaroti /
GK19asvsau2u:1088: malakṣayārthaṃ na malodbhavārthaṃ rajastathāsmai munirācakarṣa // Saund_10.42 //
GK19asvsau2u:1089: doṣāṃśca kāyād bhiṣagujjihīrṣurbhūyo yathā kleśayituṃ yateta /
GK19asvsau2u:1090: rāgaṃ tathā tasya munirjighāṃsurbhūyastaraṃ rāgamupānināya // Saund_10.43 //
GK19asvsau2u:1093: mahacca rūpaṃ svaṇu hanti rūpaṃ śabdo mahān hanti ca śabdamalpam /
GK19asvsau2u:1094: gurvī rujā hanti rujāṃ ca mṛdvīṃ sarvo mahān heturaṇorvadhāya // Saund_10.45 //
GK19asvsau2u:1096: avītarāgasya hi durbalasya mano dahedapsarasāṃ vapuḥśrīḥ // Saund_10.46 //
GK19asvsau2u:1098: rāgeṇa rāgaṃ pratihantukāmo munirvirāgo giramityuvāca // Saund_10.47 //
GK19asvsau2u:1099: etāḥ striyaḥ paśya divaukasastvaṃ nirīkṣya ca brūhi yathārthatattvam /
GK19asvsau2u:1100: etāḥ kathaṃ rūpaguṇairmatāste sa vā jano yatra gataṃ manaste // Saund_10.48 //
GK19asvsau2u:1104: tadantare 'sau kṛpaṇā vadhūste vapuṣmatīrapsarasaḥ pratītya // Saund_10.50 //
GK19asvsau2u:1105: āsthā yathā pūrvamabhūnna kācidanyāsu me strīṣu niśāmya bhāryām /
GK19asvsau2u:1106: tasyāṃ tataḥsamprati kācidāsthā na me niśāmyaiva hi rūpamāsām // Saund_10.51 //
GK19asvsau2u:1107: yathā pratapto mṛdunātapena dahyeta kaścin mahatānalena /
GK19asvsau2u:1108: rāgeṇa pūrvaṃ mṛdunābhitapto rāgāgninānena tathābhidahye // Saund_10.52 //
GK19asvsau2u:1109: vāgvāriṇāṃ māṃ pariṣiñca tasmādyāvanna dahye sa ivābjaśatruḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1110: rāgāgniradyaiva hiṃ māṃ didhakṣuḥ kakṣaṃ savṛkṣāgramivotthito 'gniḥ // Saund_10.53 //
GK19asvsau2u:1111: prasīda sīdāmi vimuñca mā mune vasundharādhairya na dhairyamasti me /
GK19asvsau2u:1112: asūn vimokṣyāmi vimuktamānasa prayaccha vā vāgamṛtaṃ mumūrṣave // Saund_10.54 //
GK19asvsau2u:1114: ahaṃ hi daṣṭo hṛdi manmathāhinā vidhatsva tasmādagadaṃ mahābhiṣak // Saund_10.55 //
GK19asvsau2u:1115: anena daṣṭo madanāhināhinā na kaścidātmanyanavasthitaḥ sthitaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1116: mumoha bodhyorhyacalātmano mano babhūva dhīmāṃśca sa śantanustanuḥ // Saund_10.56 //
GK19asvsau2u:1117: sthite viśiṣṭe tvayi saṃśraye śraye yathā na yāmīha vasan diśaṃ diśam /
GK19asvsau2u:1118: yathā ca labdhvā vyasanakṣayaṃ kṣayaṃ vrajāmi tanme kuru śaṃsataḥ sataḥ // Saund_10.57 //
GK19asvsau2u:1119: tato jighāṃsurhṛdi tasya tattamastamonudo naktamivotthitaṃ tamaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1121: dhṛtiṃ pariṣvajya vidhūya vikriyāṃ nigṛhya tāvacchrutacetasī śṛṇu /
GK19asvsau2u:1122: imā yadi prārthayase tvamaṅganā vidhatsva śuklārthamihottamaṃ tapaḥ // Saund_10.59 //
GK19asvsau2u:1123: imā hi śakyā na balānna sevayā na saṃpradānena na rūpavattayā /
GK19asvsau2u:1124: imā hriyante khalu dharmacaryayā sacet praharṣaścara dharmamādṛtaḥ // Saund_10.60 //
GK19asvsau2u:1125: ihādhivāso divi daivataiḥ samaṃ vanāni ramyāṇyajarāśca yoṣitaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1126: idaṃ phalaṃ svasya śubhasya karmaṇo na dattamanyena na cāpyahetutaḥ // Saund_10.61 //
GK19asvsau2u:1127: kṣitau manuṣyo dhanurādibhiḥ śramaiḥ striyaḥ kadāciddhi labheta vā na vā /
GK19asvsau2u:1128: asaṃśayaṃ yattviha dharmacaryayā bhaveyuretā divi puṇyakarmaṇaḥ // Saund_10.62 //
GK19asvsau2u:1130: ahaṃ ca te 'tra pratibhūḥ sthire vrate yathā tvamābhiniyataṃ sameṣyasi // Saund_10.63 //
GK19asvsau2u:1131: ataḥparaṃ paramamiti vyavasthitaḥ parāṃ dhṛtiṃ paramamunau cakāra saḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1132: tato muniḥ pavana ivāmbarāt patan pragṛhya taṃ punaragamanmahītalam // Saund_10.64 //
GK19asvsau2u:1133: saundarananda mahākāvye “svargadarśana” nāma daśama sarga samāpta /
GK19asvsau2u:1137: babandha niyamastambhe durdamaṃ capalaṃ manaḥ // Saund_11.1 //
GK19asvsau2u:1139: cacāra viraso dharmaṃ niveśyāpsaraso hṛdi // Saund_11.2 //
GK19asvsau2u:1144: saṃvṛtena ca śāntena tīvreṇa madanena ca /
GK19asvsau2u:1145: jalāgneriva saṃsargācchaśāma ca śuśoṣa ca // Saund_11.5 //
GK19asvsau2u:1149: vītarāga ivātasthau na jaharṣa na cukṣubhe // Saund_11.7 //
GK19asvsau2u:1153: nigṛhītendriyaḥ svastho niyame yadi saṃsthitaḥ // Saund_11.9 //
GK19asvsau2u:1157: prabalaḥ prabalaireva yatnairnaśyati vā na vā // Saund_11.11 //
GK19asvsau2u:1159: vinivṛtto yadi [ca] te sarvathā dhṛtimānasi // Saund_11.12 //
GK19asvsau2u:1161: atisargaśca lubdhena brahmacaryaṃ ca rāgiṇā // Saund_11.13 //
GK19asvsau2u:1165: rūkṣamapyāśaye śuddhe rukṣato naiti sajjanaḥ // Saund_11.15 //
GK19asvsau2u:1167: durlabhaṃ tu priyahitaṃ svādu pathyamivauṣadham // Saund_11.16 //
GK19asvsau2u:1171: tvacchreyo hi vivakṣā me yato nārhāmyupekṣitum // Saund_11.18 //
GK19asvsau2u:1181: yajjñātvā tvayi jātaṃ me hāsyaṃ kāruṇyameva ca // Saund_11.23 //
GK19asvsau2u:1182: yathāsanārthaṃ skandhena kaścid gurvīṃ śilāṃ vahet /
GK19asvsau2u:1187: dharmacaryā tava tathā paṇyabhūtā na śāntaye // Saund_11.26 //
GK19asvsau2u:1194: hṛdi kāmāgninā dīpte kāyena vahato vratam /
GK19asvsau2u:1197: prāptāstyaktāśca śataśastābhyaḥ kimiti te spṛhā // Saund_11.31 //
GK19asvsau2u:1199: nāpi kāmaiḥ satṛṣṇasya tasmāt kāmā na tṛṣtaye // Saund_11.32 //
GK19asvsau2u:1200: atṛptau sa kutaḥ śāntiraśāntau ca kutaḥ sukham /
GK19asvsau2u:1201: asukhe ca kutaḥ prītiraprītau ca kuto ratiḥ // Saund_11.33 //
GK19asvsau2u:1202: riraṃsā yadi te tasmādadhyātme dhīyatāṃ manaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1203: praśāntā cānavadyā ca nāstyadhyātmasamā ratiḥ // Saund_11.34 //
GK19asvsau2u:1204: na tatra kāryaṃ tūryaiste na strībhirna vibhūṣaṇaiḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1206: mānasaṃ balavad duḥkhaṃ tarṣe tiṣṭhati tiṣṭhati /
GK19asvsau2u:1207: taṃ tarṣaṃ chindhi duḥkhaṃ hi tṛṣṇā cāsti ca nāsti ca // Saund_11.36 //
GK19asvsau2u:1208: saṃpattau vā vipattau vā divā vā naktameva vā /
GK19asvsau2u:1209: kāmeṣu hi satṛṣṇasya na śāntirupapadyate // Saund_11.37 //
GK19asvsau2u:1210: kāmānāṃ prārthanā duḥkhā prāptau tṛptirna vidyate /
GK19asvsau2u:1211: viyogānniyataḥ śoko viyogaśca dhruvo divi // Saund_11.38 //
GK19asvsau2u:1212: kṛtvāpi duṣkaraṃ karma svarge labdhvāpi durlabham /
GK19asvsau2u:1213: nṛlokaṃ punarevaiti pravāsāt svagṛhaṃ yathā // Saund_11.39 //
GK19asvsau2u:1214: yadā bhraṣṭasya kuśalaṃ śiṣṭaṃ kiṃcinna vidyate /
GK19asvsau2u:1215: tiryakṣu pitṛloke vā narake copapadyate // Saund_11.40 //
GK19asvsau2u:1217: bhraṣṭasyārtasya duḥkhena kimāsvādaḥ karoti saḥ // Saund_11.41 //
GK19asvsau2u:1219: śiviḥ svargāt paribhraṣṭastādṛk kṛtvāpi duṣkaram // Saund_11.42 //
GK19asvsau2u:1221: sa devatvaṃ gataḥ kāle māndhātādhaḥ punaryayau // Saund_11.43 //
GK19asvsau2u:1222: rājyaṃ kṛtvāpi devānāṃ papāta nahuṣo bhuvi /
GK19asvsau2u:1223: prāptaḥ kila bhujaṃgatvaṃ nādyāpi parimucyate // Saund_11.44 //
GK19asvsau2u:1225: svargaṃ gatvā punarbhraṣṭaḥ kūrmībhūtaḥ kilārṇave // Saund_11.45 //
GK19asvsau2u:1226: bhūridyumno yayātiśca te cānye ca nṛparṣabhāḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1229: śriyaṃ samanuśocantaḥ pātālaṃ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ // Saund_11.47 //
GK19asvsau2u:1231: mahendrāḥ śataśaḥ peturmāhātmyamapi na sthiram // Saund_11.48 //
GK19asvsau2u:1234: hā caitraratha hā vāpi hā mandākini hā priye /
GK19asvsau2u:1235: ityārtā vilapanto 'pi gāṃ patanti divaukasaḥ // Saund_11.50 //
GK19asvsau2u:1237: kiṃ punaḥ patatāṃ svargādevānte sukhasevinām // Saund_11.51 //
GK19asvsau2u:1238: rajo gṛṇhanti vāsāṃsi mlāyanti paramāḥ srajaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1239: gātrebhyo jāyate svedo ratirbhavati nāsane // Saund_11.52 //
GK19asvsau2u:1243: yacca duḥkhaṃ nipatatāṃ duḥkhameva viśiṣyate // Saund_11.54 //
GK19asvsau2u:1245: vijñāya kṣayiṇaṃ svargamapavarge matiṃ kuru // Saund_11.55 //
GK19asvsau2u:1251: ko nāma svargavāsaya kṣeṣṇave spṛhayed budhaḥ // Saund_11.58 //
GK19asvsau2u:1252: sūtreṇa baddho hi yathā vihaṃgo vyāvartate dūragato 'pi bhūyaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1253: ajñānasūtreṇa tathāvabaddho gato 'pi dūraṃ punareti lokaḥ // Saund_11.59 //
GK19asvsau2u:1254: kṛtvā kālavilakṣaṇaṃ pratibhuvā mukto yathā bandhanād
GK19asvsau2u:1255: bhuktvā veśmasukhānyatītya samayaṃ bhūyo viśed vandhanaṃ /
GK19asvsau2u:1257: kāle karmasu teṣu bhuktaviṣayeṣvākṛṣate gāṃ punaḥ // Saund_11.60 //
GK19asvsau2u:1261: manyante śivamacyutaṃ dhruvamiti svaṃ sthānamāvartakam // Saund_11.61 //
GK19asvsau2u:1263: saṃsāre bhrāmyamāṇaṃ divi nṛṣu narake tiryakpitṛṣu ca /
GK19asvsau2u:1265: taddhetorbrahmacaryaṃ cara jahi hi calaṃ svargaṃ prati rucim // Saund_11.62 //
GK19asvsau2u:1266: saundarananda mahākāvye “svarga kī hīnatā” nāma ekādaśa sarga samāpta //
GK19asvsau2u:1270: ānandena tadā nandaḥ paraṃ vrīḍamupāgamat // Saund_12.1 //
GK19asvsau2u:1271: tasya vrīḍena mahatā pramodo hṛdi nābhavat /
GK19asvsau2u:1272: aprāmodyena vimukhaṃ nāvatasthe vrate manaḥ // Saund_12.2 //
GK19asvsau2u:1274: paripākagate hetau na sa tanmamṛṣe vacaḥ // Saund_12.3 //
GK19asvsau2u:1276: tasmāt kṣeṣṇuṃ pariśrutya bhṛśaṃ saṃvegameyivān // Saund_12.4 //
GK19asvsau2u:1285: babhūva sa hi saṃvegaḥ śreyasastasya vṛddhaye /
GK19asvsau2u:1288: triṣu kāleṣu sarveṣu nipāto 'stiriva smṛtaḥ // Saund_12.10 //
GK19asvsau2u:1295: śrutvā hyāvartakaṃ svargaṃ saṃsārastha ca citratām /
GK19asvsau2u:1296: na martyeṣu na deveṣu pravṛttirmama rocate // Saund_12.14 //
GK19asvsau2u:1297: yadi prāpya divaṃ yatnānniyamena damena ca /
GK19asvsau2u:1298: avitṛptāḥ patantyante svargāya tyāgine namaḥ // Saund_12.15 //
GK19asvsau2u:1302: yacchrutvā śṛṇvatāṃ śreṣṭha paramaṃ prāpnuyāṃ padam // Saund_12.17 //
GK19asvsau2u:1309: adya te saphalaṃ janma lābho 'dya sumahāṃstava /
GK19asvsau2u:1313: duḥkhaṃ na syāt sukhaṃ me syāditi prayatate janaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1314: atyantaduḥkhoparamaṃ sukhaṃ tacca na budhyate // Saund_12.23 //
GK19asvsau2u:1316: kāmādiṣu jagat saktaṃ na vetti sukhamavyayam // Saund_12.24 //
GK19asvsau2u:1318: viṣaṃ pītvā yadagadaṃ samaye pātumicchasi // Saund_12.25 //
GK19asvsau2u:1322: sadoṣaṃ salilaṃ dṛṣṭvā pathineva pipāsunā // Saund_12.27 //
GK19asvsau2u:1324: rajasā caṇḍavātena vivasvata iva prabhā // Saund_12.28 //
GK19asvsau2u:1325: sā jighāṃsustamo hārdaṃ yā saṃprati vijṛmbhate /
GK19asvsau2u:1326: tamo naiśaṃ prabhā saurī vinirgīrṇeva meruṇā // Saund_12.29 //
GK19asvsau2u:1328: yatte syānnaiṣṭhike sūkṣme śreyasi śraddadhānatā // Saund_12.30 //
GK19asvsau2u:1332: śayyābuddhau ca śayanaṃ sthānabuddhau tathā sthitiḥ // Saund_12.32 //
GK19asvsau2u:1334: arthiṃtve sati yatnena tadā khanati gāmimām // Saund_12.33 //
GK19asvsau2u:1335: nārthī yadyagninā vā syācchraddadhyāttaṃ na vāraṇau /
GK19asvsau2u:1337: sasyotpattiṃ yadi na vā śraddadhyāt kārṣakaḥ kṣitau /
GK19asvsau2u:1338: arthī sasyena vā na syād bījāni na vaped bhuvi // Saund_12.35 //
GK19asvsau2u:1339: ataśca hasta ityuktā mayā śraddhā viśeṣataḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1340: yasmād gṛṇhāti saddharmaṃ dāyaṃ hasta yato yathāḥ // Saund_12.36 //
GK19asvsau2u:1348: mayoktā kāryatastasmāttatra tatra tathā tathā // Saund_12.40 //
GK19asvsau2u:1350: tadvṛddhau vardhate dharmo mūlavṛddhau yathā drumaḥ // Saund_12.41 //
GK19asvsau2u:1351: vyākulaṃ darśanaṃ yasya durbalo yasya niścayaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1352: tasya pāriplavā śraddhā na hiṃ kṛtyāya vartate // Saund_12.42 //
GK19asvsau2u:1353: yāvattattvaṃ na bhavati hi dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ vā tāvacchraddhā na bhavati balasthā sthirā vā /
GK19asvsau2u:1354: dṛṣṭe tattve niyamaparibhūtendriyasya śraddhāvṛkṣo bhavati saphalaścāśrayaśca // Saund_12.43 //
GK19asvsau2u:1355: saundarananda mahākāvya meṃ “viveka” nāmaka dvādaśa sarga samāpta /
GK19asvsau2u:1358: atha saṃrādhito nandaḥ śraddhāṃ prati maharṣiṇā /
GK19asvsau2u:1360: kṛtārthamiva taṃ mene saṃbuddhaḥ śraddhayā tayā /
GK19asvsau2u:1361: mene prāptamiva śreyaḥ sa ca buddhena saṃskṛtaḥ // Saund_13.2 //
GK19asvsau2u:1362: ślakṣṇena vacasā kāṃścit kāṃścit paruṣayā girā /
GK19asvsau2u:1364: pāṃsubhyaḥ kāñcanaṃ jātaṃ viśuddhaṃ nirmalaṃ śuci /
GK19asvsau2u:1365: sthitaṃ pāṃsuṣvapi yathā pāṃsudoṣairna lipyate // Saund_13.4 //
GK19asvsau2u:1366: padmaparṇaṃ yathā caiva jale jātaṃ jale sthitam /
GK19asvsau2u:1370: śleṣaṃ tyāgaṃ priyaṃ rūkṣaṃ kathāṃ ca dhyānameva ca /
GK19asvsau2u:1375: abravīd bruvatāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ kramajñaḥ śreyasāṃ kramam // Saund_13.9 //
GK19asvsau2u:1378: prayogaḥ kāyavacasoḥ śuddho bhavati te yathā /
GK19asvsau2u:1395: asya nāśena naiva syāt pravrajyā na gṛhasthatā // Saund_13.19 //
GK19asvsau2u:1398: śīlamāsthāya vartante sarvā hi śreyasi kriyāḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1409: ataḥ śīlaṃ nayatyagryamiti śīlaṃ viśodhaya // Saund_13.26 //
GK19asvsau2u:1412: śīlaṃ hi śaraṇaṃ saubhya kāntāra iva daiśikaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1413: pitraṃ bandhuśca rakṣā ca dhanaṃ ca balameva ca // Saund_13.28 //
GK19asvsau2u:1419: indriyebhyo yathā svebhyastairajasraṃ hi hanyate // Saund_13.31 //

GK19asvsau2u:2185: idaṃ kṛtārthaḥ paramārthavit kṛtī tvameva dhīmannabhidhātumarhasi /
GK19asvsau2u:2186: atītya kāntāramavāptasādhanaḥ sudaiśikasyeva kṛtaṃ mahāvaṇik // Saund_18.50 //
GK19asvsau2u:2188: na dṛṣṭasatyo 'pi tathāvabudhyate pṛthagjanaḥ kiṃbata buddhimānapi // Saund_18.51 //
GK19asvsau2u:2190: rajaḥprakarṣeṇa jagatyavasthite kṛtajñabhāvo hi kṛtajña durlabhaḥ // Saund_18.52 //
GK19asvsau2u:2191: sadharma dharmānvayato yataśca te mayi prasādo 'dhigame ca kauśalam /
GK19asvsau2u:2192: ato 'sti bhūyastvayi me vivakṣitaṃ nato hi bhaktaśca niyogamarhasi // Saund_18.53 //
GK19asvsau2u:2193: avāptakāryo 'si parāṃ gatiṃ gato na te 'sti kiñcit karaṇīyamaṇvapi /
GK19asvsau2u:2194: ataḥparaṃ saumya carānukampayā vimokṣayan kṛcchragatān parānapi // Saund_18.54 //
GK19asvsau2u:2196: kriyāmamutraiva phalāya madhyamo viśiṣṭadharmā punarapravṛttaye // Saund_18.55 //
GK19asvsau2u:2197: ihottamebhyo 'pi mataḥ sa tūttamo ya uttamaṃ dharmamavāpya naiṣṭhikam /
GK19asvsau2u:2199: vihāya tasmādiha kāryamātmanaḥ kuru sthirātman parakāryamapyatho /
GK19asvsau2u:2200: bhramatsu sattveṣu tamāvṛtātmasu śrutapradīpo niśi dhāryatāmayam // Saund_18.57 //
GK19asvsau2u:2201: bravītu tāvat puri vismito janastvayi sthite kurvati dharmadeśanāḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:2202: aho batāścaryamidaṃ vimuktaye karoti rāgī yadayaṃ kathāmiti // Saund_18.58 //
GK19asvsau2u:2203: dhruvaṃ hi saṃśrutya tava sthiraṃ mano nivṛttanānāviṣayairmanorathaiḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:2204: vadhūrgṛhe sāpi tavānukurvatī kariṣyate strīṣu virāgiṇīḥ kathāḥ // Saund_18.59 //
GK19asvsau2u:2205: tvayi paramadhṛtau niviṣṭatattve bhavanagatā na hi raṃsyate dhruvaṃ sā /
GK19asvsau2u:2206: manasi śamadamātmake vivikte matiriva kāmasukhaiḥ parīkṣakasya // Saund_18.60 //
GK19asvsau2u:2207: ityarhataḥ paramakāruṇikasya śāsturmūrdhnā vacaśca caraṇau ca samaṃ gṛhītvā /
GK19asvsau2u:2208: svasthaḥ praśāntahṛdayo vinivṛttakāryaḥ pārśvānmuneḥ pratiyayau vimadaḥ karīva // Saund_18.61 //
GK19asvsau2u:2209: bhikṣārthaṃ samaye viveśa sa puraṃ dṛṣṭīrjanasyākṣipan
GK19asvsau2u:2211: nirmokṣāya cakāra tatra ca kathāṃ kāle janāyārthine
GK19asvsau2u:2213: ityeṣā vyupaśāntaye na rataye mokṣārthagarbhā kṛtiḥ
GK19asvsau2u:2216: kṛtaṃ pātuṃ titkamivauṣadhaṃ madhuyutaṃ hṛdyaṃ kathaṃ syāditi // Saund_18.63 //
GK19asvsau2u:2218: kāvyavyājena tattvaṃ kathitamiha mayā mokṣaḥ paramiti /
GK19asvsau2u:2219: tadbuddhvā śamikaṃ yattadavahitamito grāhyaṃ na lalitaṃ
GK19asvsau2u:2221: saundarananda mahākāvya meṃ “ājñāvyākaraṇa” nāmaka aṣṭādaśa sarga samāpta /
